The True Yang Nine Elders Mysterious Unity Sovereign, primordial qi of the Cavernous Dawn, is named *Ming Liulan* ("Radiance Flows Resplendent") and styled *Xuantong Bo* ("Proclaiming Pervasive Vigor"), standing fifty million zhang in height. In the three months of summer, he wears the Precious Dawn Permeating Essence Crown, a nine-colored cloud-patterned brocade robe, and bears the Supreme Lord’s Mandate Spirit Seal and Dragon Radiance Cinnabar Script. Standing upon purple clouds, seated upon a seven-colored lotus, his light shines brilliantly. Visualize him as five inches and five fen in length. In the three months of autumn, he transforms into an infant seated within the Purple Void, crowned with a five-colored lotus canopy, holding a five-fungus flowered banner. Visualize him returning to his true form. In the three months of winter, he transforms into moonlight, azure and luxuriant, within purple clouds above azure blossoms. His radiance flows and illuminates, penetrating Upper Clarity. Visualize him returning to his true form. In the three months of spring, he transforms into a tri-colored light of azure, green, and mysterious black, swirling and intertwining like clouds in confluence, surging within Upper Clarity. This is the return of the qi of the True Yang Nine Elders; further refine the essence of the Cavernous Dawn. Visualize him returning to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Mysterious Unity of the Nine Elders, always on the day of the Summer Solstice, purify the body and enter the chamber. Facing west, bow three times in reverence to the Nine Elders. Then turn north, sit upright, click the teeth twelve times, and visualize the Mysterious Unity Sovereign of the Nine Elders shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Flying Mystery Palace of Upper Clarity, the Cavernous Grand Mansion of the Nine Origins Village within the Three Passes Ward. His truth returns, descending to illuminate outside the Gate of Destiny. Softly invoke:

*"Cavernous Dawn refines true yang,
Mysterious Elders arise upon the void.
Four transformations alter the wondrous root,
Cloud radiance shines like the bright moon.
Swiftly traverse the cinnabar thoroughfare of the void,
Harness the reins of the vermilion rhythm.
Subtly guide the confluence of the nether realms,
Together assemble at the Nine Numinous Portal.
Oh, the merit of preserving the kalpa—
Who can fathom the floating and the bound?"*

When finished, raise the head and swallow qi nine times to conclude. Those who know the four seasonal transformations of Mysterious Unity and cultivate for nine years shall witness the true form descend into their bedchamber, able to transform into the Great Void and fly through Upper Clarity.

The Supreme Tenuity Heavenly Thearch, primordial qi of the Cavernous Origin, is named *Da Chongshu* ("Great Revered Attribution") and styled *Yuandong Du* ("Cavernous Origin Measure"), standing thirty million zhang in height. In the three months of autumn, he wears the Nine Origins Flying Infant Crown and a seven-colored phoenix-cloud robe, girded with the Night Radiance Precious Seal and Intertwining Numinous White Sash. Standing upon five-colored lions, his body emits thirty-two hues of jeweled light, above Upper Clarity. Visualize him as three inches and two fen in length. In the three months of winter, he transforms into an immeasurable perfected person, his body radiating golden light to illuminate the ten directions. Standing upon nine-colored blossoms, he holds a golden bell. Visualize him returning to his true form. In the three months of spring, he transforms into solar light with purple rays, blazing upon Jade Void to illuminate the ten directions. Visualize him returning to his true form. In the three months of summer, he transforms into a tri-colored light of white, azure, and green, intertwining like layered clouds. This is the Thearch’s return of the qi of Supreme Tenuity; further refine the essence of the Cavernous Origin. Visualize him returning to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Heavenly Thearch, always on the day of the Spring Equinox, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing east, bow twice in reverence to the Thearch. Then turn north, sit upright, click the teeth three times, and visualize the Thearch shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Cloud Radiance Palace of Upper Clarity, the Eight Luminous Mansion of the Three Perfected Village within the Five Dawns Ward. His truth returns, descending to illuminate beneath the right armpit. Softly invoke:

*"Cavernous source transforms the numinous,
Nine colors shine resplendent.
Returning to unite with Supreme Tenuity,
Four transformations perfect the true.
Jade Void surges luxuriantly,
Radiance blazes with vermilion mist.
Containing blossoms and rinsing with springs,
Fragrance flies through the eightfold entwinement.
Gaze upward to feast on flowing brilliance,
Refine and bathe my body.
My body transforms,
Ascending into the Nine Heavens.
Inscribed in the immortal register,
Bound in affinity with the Thearch."*

When finished, raise the head and swallow qi nine times to conclude.

Those who comprehend the Four Seasonal Transformations of the Thearch Lord attain a lifespan equal to the Three Luminaries. Cultivating this Dao, they ascend to fly through Upper Clarity. Should one lightly disclose or carelessly reveal its secrets, their seven generations of ancestors shall bear the blame.

The Azure Numinous Yang-An Lord is the qi of the Primordial Cavernous Vastness. His taboo name is "Degree of the Multitude of Methods," and his style is "Great Illumination." His stature spans fifty million *zhang*. In the three months of winter, he dons the Threefold Essence Hibiscus Morning Crown, robes of cloud-patterned cinnabar brocade flying garments, and shoes of nine-colored lions. He wears flowing golden fire-bells, a sash of the Seven Primes, and his body emanates the sevenfold radiance of transformation. Resplendent within the subtle intricacies of Jade Clarity’s upper reaches, when visualized, he returns to a height of three feet and three inches.

In the three months of spring, he transforms his form into that of an old man, his head crowned with a flying dragon, mouth holding the moon, body clad in feathered robes, and hands grasping a purple scroll. Amidst the cinnabar clouds, he illuminates Jade Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of summer, he transforms into a tiger-headed, human-bodied being, his five-colored markings resplendent, his light illuminating the ten directions. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of autumn, he transforms into a radiance of yellow, green, and purple hues, merging with the primordial chaos of Upper Clarity, gleaming like the sun’s brilliance. This is the returning true qi of the numinous. Having further refined the essence of the Cavernous Vastness, when visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Yang-An Lord, on the day of the Beginning of Spring, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing east, bow twice and pay homage to the Yang-An Lord. Then, turn north, click the teeth nine times, and visualize the Yang-An Lord’s four seasonal forms and shadows within the Six Harmonies Mansion’s Vast Numinous Ward of the Cavernous Spring Hamlet in the Swaying Palace of Upper Clarity. His truth returns, descending to illuminate between the two pellets beneath the axle of your carriage gate. Softly invoke:

*"The Cavernous Vastness stands amidst the Five Flowers,
Divine radiance bathes the Azure Numinous.
Merging with the Thearch’s singular qi,
Transformations arise in accord with the turning of fate.
Penetrating the numinous hall’s inception,
Revealing the profound to refine the cinnabar form.
Within the mysterious depths of the Nine Primes,
In the vast emptiness, essence abides.
True effulgences gleam in the Cloud Palace,
Brilliantly illuminating the Three Clarities.
Returning to shine within the subtle intricacies,
They manifest your form and name.
Qi enters the chamber of spirit’s quiescence,
Revolving to feast in the Purple Empyrean’s chariot."*

When finished, swallow qi three times to conclude.

Those who comprehend the Yang-An Lord’s fourfold transformations attain a lifespan equal to heaven and earth. After nine years of cultivation, they ascend in broad daylight to fly.

The Supreme Primordial Three Prime Lords are the qi of the Primordial Dawn’s Splendor. Their taboo name is "Cloud-Nurtured Essence," and their style is "Flourishing Mushroom." Their stature spans thirty million *zhang*. In the three months of spring, they don the Precious Mysterious Supporting Dawn Feather Crown, wear a purple qi floating cloud brocade mantle, a nine-colored dragon brocade feathered skirt, and a waist sash of flowing golden fire-bells, tiger tallies, and dragon scripts. Seated amidst the Great Void, beneath their knees ever drift cinnabar, green, and white clouds of the Three Primes, their luminous radiance gleaming and illuminating the ten directions. Within the subtle intricacies above the Nine Heavens, when visualized, they return to a height of seven inches.

In the three months of summer, they transform into a single body with three heads, wearing seven-tiered treasure crowns and robes of the Three Primes’ flying cloud brocade. They stand upon nine-colored phoenixes, their light illuminating the ten directions. When visualized, they revert to their true forms.

In the three months of autumn, they transform into the radiant essence of the Seven Luminaries’ jade light, resplendent above the purple clouds, their luminous hues luxuriant like the sun’s brilliance. When visualized, they revert to their true forms.

In the three months of winter, they transform into a radiance of purple, white, and yellow hues, billowing and surging like the essence of gold. This is the returning qi of the Supreme Primordial. Having further refined the essence of the Dawn’s Splendor, when visualized, they revert to their true forms.

To cultivate the Dao of the Three Prime Lords, on the days of one’s life destiny and the Grand Year Star, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing west, bow thrice and pay homage to the Three Prime Lords. Then, turn north, sit upright, click the teeth nine times, and visualize the Three Prime Lords’ four seasonal forms and shadows within the Nine Mysteries Mansion’s Dawn Splendor Ward of the Jade Thearch Hamlet in the Precious Simplicity Palace of Upper Clarity. Their truth returns, descending to illuminate the gate of your nine apertures. Softly invoke:

*"The Three Primes revolve the Heavenly Origin,
Flowing auroras wing the Jade Numinous.
Gently riding the mysterious dispersal,
Wafting through the emptiness of Upper Clarity.
Grasping my natural fate’s turning,
Transformations defy constant names.
Wondrous awakening at the primal dawn,
Rejoicing in my aeons of years.
Though the Great Auroras stretch afar,
Their penetrating radiance oversees the sentient.
Together we hold the jade covenant,
To ascend in unison to the Nine Heavens’ chariot."*

When finished, swallow qi three times to conclude.

These are the secret Dao of the Purple Prime Six Harmonies Palace. Those who comprehend the Three Primes’ four seasonal transformations become deathless. Cultivating this Dao, they ascend to fly through Upper Clarity.

The Highest Supreme Primordial Lord is the qi of the Primordial Cavernous Vision. His taboo name is "Precious Cavernous Penetration," and his style is "Illuminator of the Worldly Clan." His stature spans thirty million *zhang*. In the three months of summer, he wears the Purple Prime Treasure Crown, robes of seven-colored cinnabar brocade, and bears the Seven Luminaries’ Primordial Seal of the Vast and Falling. Girded with the Three Treasures’ Summoning Immortal Talismans, he stands upon five-colored lotuses, his radiance gleaming and illuminating. When visualized, he returns to a height of seven inches.

In the three months of autumn, the Supreme Primordial Lord transforms into a dragon-headed, human-bodied being, his five-colored markings resplendent, his light flowing and shining to illuminate the ten directions. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of winter, the Supreme Primordial Lord transforms into the form of three suns, their light merging with the primordial chaos to illuminate Upper Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of spring, the Supreme Primordial Lord transforms into a radiance of azure and white hues, resplendent within the primordial qi, above the Purple Empyrean. This is the returning qi of the Highest Supreme Primordial. Having further refined the essence of the Primordial Cavernous Vision, when visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Supreme Primordial Lord, on the day of *jiazi*, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing northwest, bow twice and pay homage to the Supreme Primordial Lord. Then, turn north, sit upright, click the teeth three times, and visualize the Supreme Primordial Lord’s four seasonal forms and shadows within the Boundless Mansion’s Heaven-Reflecting Ward of the Seven Phases Hamlet in the Ninefold Revolutions Hamlet of Upper Clarity. His truth returns, descending to illuminate the mansion of your spine’s vertebrae. Softly intone:

*"The Supreme Primordial wields the tally to turn fate,
The Four Sceneries soar in emptiness.
Penetrating essence, dispersing qi,
Refining transformations in purple radiance.
The Three Guests’ floral canopy,
Green chariots linger and circle.
Flowing to illuminate the auroral court,
Radiance gleams in the lofty subtleties.
Come to transform my spirit,
To grow my feathered robes.
Lightly soaring in plumed garments,
The eight qi ascend in unison."*

When finished, swallow the qi eight times and cease. Knowing the Supreme Primordial’s transformations with the four seasons, one may attain longevity of ten thousand years. Practicing this Dao, one may ascend to Upper Clarity in flight—yet lightly divulging its sacred writ brings death and the loss of immortality.

The Upper Clarity Purple Essence Threefold Primordial Lord, the qi of the Primordial Yang Grotto, bears the taboo name Xiaohua and the style Falingyao, standing seventy million *zhang* in height. In the three months of autumn, he wears the Morning Essence Circlet upon his head, robes of five-colored tiger-patterned cloth, the Intertwined Numinous White Sash at his waist, and the Sword of Summoning Immortals at his side, standing atop a nine-colored lion. A halo of radiance emanates from his neck, illuminating Upper Clarity—visualize him shrinking to seven *cun* in length. In the three months of winter, the Purple Essence Threefold Primordial Lord transforms into a phoenix-headed, human-bodied form, clad in azure, emerald, and purple feathered robes, his light streaming and reflecting throughout Upper Clarity—visualize him reverting to his true form. In the three months of spring, the Purple Essence Threefold Primordial Lord transforms into a human-headed, dragon-bodied form, his patterned radiance illuminating Upper Clarity—visualize him reverting to his true form. In the three months of summer, the Purple Essence Threefold Primordial Lord transforms into a swirling mass of yellow and black light, intertwined like ascending clouds, reverting to the purple essence qi while further refining the essence of the Grotto Yang—visualize him reverting to his true form.

To practice the Dao of the Three Primordial Lords, always on the day of *gengshen*, bathe and enter the chamber, bow twice facing west to greet the Primordial Lords, then turn north, sit upright, and click the teeth three times. Visualize the Three Primordial Lords’ four seasonal forms and shadows within the Jade Emperor’s Palace of Upper Clarity, the Jeweled Cloud Ward of the Three Qi Hamlet in the Intertwined Numinous Precinct. His truth returns, descending to illuminate the gate of your skull’s great mallet bone. Softly intone:

*"Purple essence scatters radiant splendor,
Refining and transmuting the ninefold qi court.
Square and round, the Threefold Convenience Ward,
Separating and uniting, altering fate’s course.
Exhaling fluid to irrigate the sun’s root,
The imperial blossom gleams in Purple Clarity.
I seek the supreme Dao on high,
In subtlety lies the utmost numen.
Who can turn my chariot back?
With you, I bind a mystery-name."*

When finished, swallow the qi three times and cease. Knowing this Dao, the Threefold Primordials descend in truth. Practicing for nine years, one may ascend to Upper Clarity in flight.

The August Clarity Grotto Perfected Lord, the qi of the Primordial Luminous White Numen, bears the taboo name Yuanbao Cong and the style Lixuan Ze, standing fifty million *zhang* in height. In the three months of winter, he wears the Three-Ridged Jade Morning Crown, robes of seven-colored tiger-patterned fur, and a belt adorned with flowing gold fire bells and a seven-colored staff banner, standing atop the Threefold Primordials’ Flying Clouds. His light shines resplendent within the Jade Void—visualize him shrinking to five *cun* and five *fen* in length. In the three months of spring, the Grotto Perfected Lord transforms, wearing a yellow headscarf and a robe of forty-two strips, holding a floral banner, standing upon purple clouds—visualize him reverting to his true form. In the three months of summer, the Grotto Perfected Lord transforms, his eyes closed in darkness, wearing a floral canopy upon his head and treading upon lotus blossoms—visualize him reverting to his true form. In the three months of autumn, the Grotto Perfected Lord transforms into a radiance of yellow and white light, its brilliance streaming and glowing within the Great Void, illuminating the Ten Heavens. This reverts to the August Clarity’s qi, further refining the essence of the Luminous White Numen—visualize him reverting to his true form.

To practice the Dao of the Grotto Perfected Lord, on the day of the Beginning of Winter, bathe and enter the chamber, bow three times facing north to greet the Grotto Perfected Lord, then turn north, sit upright, and click the teeth twelve times. Visualize the Grotto Perfected Lord’s four seasonal forms and shadows within the Upper Clarity Grotto Mystery Palace, the Pure Subtlety Ward of the Jade Form Hamlet in the Golden Infant Precinct. His truth returns, descending to illuminate the four boundaries of your mouth. Softly intone:

*"August Clarity flaunts the morning radiance,
Numinous qi wings its ascent through the void.
Floating, floating, ascending the nine nines,
Gently, gently entering the Emperor’s dawn.
Gazing up, I draw the moon’s water,
Bowing down, I lead the sun’s blossom root.
Refining the vast numinous qi in the grotto,
Its fragrant flow irrigates my perfection.
Riding the course to seek the Emperor Lord,
My intent harmonizes to attain Jade Immortality."*

When finished, swallow the qi seven times and cease. Knowing the Dao of the Grotto Perfected Lord’s four transformations, one may converse with spirits in three years. Practicing for nine years, one may ascend to Jade Clarity in flight.

The August Supreme Four Elders Dao Center Lord, the qi of the Primordial Grotto Void, bears the taboo name Jingji and the style Haoyuan, standing seventy million *zhang* in height. In the three months of spring, he wears the Bright Perfected Seven Treasures Jade Crown upon his head, robes of phoenix-patterned brocade, the Falling Open Flowing Bells at his waist, and the Sword of Summoning Perfection at his side, standing atop a nine-colored lion. Twelve floral lights shine above Upper Clarity within the Purple Void—visualize him shrinking to seven *cun* in length. In the three months of summer, the Dao Center Lord transforms into a child, clad in five-colored robes, his mouth holding the Seven Stars, standing upon white clouds—visualize him reverting to his true form. In the three months of autumn, the Dao Center Lord transforms into a human-headed, serpent-bodied form, five-colored and resplendent, standing above the Jade Void—visualize him reverting to his true form. In the three months of winter, the Dao Center Lord transforms into a swirling mass of azure, red, and white clouds, intertwining within the Mysterious Void. This reverts to the August Supreme’s qi, further refining the essence of the Grotto Void—visualize him reverting to his true form.

To practice the Dao of the Dao Center Lord, always on the day of the Winter Solstice, bathe and enter the chamber, bow four times facing southeast to greet the Dao Center Lord, then turn north, sit upright, and click the teeth twelve times. Visualize the Dao Center Lord’s four seasonal forms and shadows within the Upper Clarity Flowing Essence Palace, the Meeting Radiance Ward of the Grand Immortals Hamlet in the Three Clarities Precinct. His truth returns, descending to illuminate the earthen gate of your tailbone. Softly intone:

*"The Four Elders’ central perfection,
Scatters floral clouds in the chamber.
Revolving radiance in four arrays,
Transforming and changing the eight directions.
Exhaling and inhaling the threefold essence,
Its flow reflects within my palace.
Immortal soul, immortal spirit,
Marrow congeals into jade countenance.
Riding the void to urge the clouds,
I fly into the Great Void."*

When finished, swallow the qi four times and cease. Knowing the Dao of the Dao Center Lord’s four transformations, one may enjoy longevity of ten thousand years. Practicing to induce spirit descent, one ascends to heaven in broad daylight.

The Jade Clarity Supreme Great Dao Lord, primordial qi of the numinous void, bears the taboo name Yin Xian and the style Bo Ku Yuan, standing ninety million zhang in height. In the autumn’s three months, his head is crowned with the Hundred-Transformations Divine Radiance Jade Coronet; he wears the Flying Frost-Pearl Robe, a seven-hued tiger-garment, and the Nine-Colored Departing-Silk Sash; girded with Morning-Light Moon-Bright Bells, he sits upon seven-colored clouds, his luminous radiance streaming through the Upper Clarity. Meditate upon him until he returns to nine inches in length.

In the winter’s three months, the Supreme Dao Lord transforms his form: his head bears the Seven-Light Round Wheel, his body clad in a thirty-two-hued dharma-robe, standing atop a nine-colored lion. His radiant brilliance shines within the Upper Clarity above the Grand Tenuity. Meditate until he reverts to his true form.

In the spring’s three months, the Supreme Great Dao Lord transforms into Lord Lao, his head wrapped in a horned kerchief, his body robed in tiger-patterned garments, holding a golden talisman, standing upon the Five Mushroom Flowers. Meditate until he reverts to his true form.

In the summer’s three months, the Supreme Great Dao Lord transforms into a dual radiance of purple and yellow, their luminous splendor intertwining, dwelling within the Purple Void. There he reverts to the qi of Jade Clarity, refining anew the essence of the numinous void. Meditate until he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Great Dao Lord, on the eight seasonal nodes and one’s natal day, bathe and enter the chamber, bow twice facing north, and pay homage to the Jade Clarity Lord. Then sit upright facing north, tap the teeth nine times, and meditate upon the Jade Clarity Lord’s four seasonal forms and shadows within the Upper Clarity’s Elixir-Pearl Palace, Sun-Gate Ward, Purple Radiance Hamlet, and Golden Light Precinct. His truth returns, descending to illuminate the twelve beams beyond your neck. Softly intone:

*"Jade Clarity girds the lofty numen,
Mastering truth to steer the Eight Clarities.
Jade blossoms drape the cinnabar chamber,
Purple phoenixes illumine cloud encampments.
He leads the mystic metropolis’ perfected,
Together refining cinnabar’s essence.
Following five spirits’ transformations,
They tend the radiance of the supreme numina.
The primordial Dao’s boundless directions,
Subtly quicken my wondrous existence.
Life’s immortals cross the talismanic registers,
Inscribing your form and name."*

When finished, tilt the head back and swallow the qi five times, then cease. This is the exalted Jade Canon; those who know it enjoy longevity of ten thousand years. Cultivating it for nine years, one soars through the Upper Clarity. To lightly disclose its utmost subtlety is to forfeit transcendence in death.

The Central Yellow Elder Lord, primordial qi of the Five Radiances, bears the taboo name Qi Ying Sheng and the style Yun Jiu Ye, standing thirty million zhang in height. In the summer’s three months, his head is crowned with the Precious Coral Morning Coronet; he wears a nine-hued cloud-garment of patterned fur, girded with the Intertwined Numen Purple Sash and twelve-hued floral radiance, ever standing atop five-colored lions. His luminous radiance streams through the Upper Clarity. Meditate upon him until he returns to three inches and three fen in length.

In the autumn’s three months, the Central Yellow Elder Lord transforms into a Jade Youth, his head adorned with Seven Essences’ blossoms, clad in a Flying Celestial Feather Robe, holding a floral banner. Meditate until he reverts to his true form.

In the winter’s three months, the Central Yellow Elder transforms into a Great Immortal, his entire body golden-hued, wearing seven-colored robes, his neck bearing a halo of radiance, his feet treading upon lotus blossoms. His luminous brilliance streams forth. Meditate until he reverts to his true form.

In the spring’s three months, the Central Yellow Elder Lord transforms into intertwining lights of purple, green, and blue, dwelling above the Jade Void. There he reverts to the qi of the Center, refining anew the essence of the primordial Five Radiances. Meditate until he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Yellow Elder Lord, on Geng Shen and Jia Zi days, bathe and enter the chamber, bow thrice facing northeast, and pay homage to the Yellow Elder Lord. Then sit upright facing north, tap the teeth twelve times, and cease. Meditate upon the Yellow Elder Lord’s four seasonal forms and shadows within the Upper Clarity’s Empty Radiance Palace, Golden Pearl Ward, Supreme Essence Hamlet, and Prosperous Joy Precinct. His truth returns, descending to illuminate the four poles within your chest. Softly intone:

*"Grand Clarity links the Jade Void,
Mysterious numina scatter the cinnabar palace.
Four transformations diverge and flow,
Each metamorphosis alters its constant form.
Wondrous scenes ride the numinous vast,
Merging to birth the emptiness-same.
Attaining truth lies in resonant meeting,
High and low mystically complete the pair.
In tranquil contemplation, the self’s form vanishes,
The heart aspires to the Dark Ridge’s peak."*

When finished, swallow the qi five times, then cease. Knowing the Yellow Elder’s four transformations, one enjoys longevity of ten thousand years. Cultivating his Way, one soars through the Upper Clarity.

The Supreme Ultimate Great Dao Primordial Radiance Lord, primordial qi of the Upper Fusion, bears the taboo name Dao Da Shi and the style Du Da Ming, standing thirty million zhang in height. In the autumn’s three months, his head is crowned with the Morning Infant Precious Coronet; he wears a seamless nine-hued unlined robe, bears the Divine Tiger’s Upper Talisman, and girds the Precious Immortal’s Sword. A flowing-golden radiance encircles his neck, illuminating seventy-four directions. He stands atop a dark turtle. Meditate upon him until he returns to three inches and three fen in length.

In the winter’s three months, the Great Dao Primordial Radiance Lord transforms into a tiger-headed dragon-bodied form, five-hued patterns adorning him, illuminating the Upper Clarity. Meditate until he reverts to his true form.

In the spring’s three months, the Great Dao Primordial Radiance Lord transforms into Lord Lao, his hair unbound to his waist, clad in a Flying Azure Feather Robe, standing upon purple clouds. Meditate until he reverts to his true form.

In the summer’s three months, the Great Dao Primordial Radiance Lord transforms into intertwining lights of red and blue, their chaotic brilliance intertwining, dwelling above the Purple Void. There he reverts to the qi of the Supreme Ultimate, refining anew the essence of the primordial Upper Fusion. Meditate until he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Primordial Radiance Lord, on the day of Autumn’s Beginning, bathe and enter the chamber, bow twice facing west, and pay homage to the Primordial Radiance Lord. Then sit upright facing north, tap the teeth three times, and meditate upon the Primordial Radiance Lord’s four seasonal forms and shadows within the Upper Clarity’s Longevity Palace, Eight Misty Ward, Supreme Origin Hamlet, and Assembly Numen Precinct. His truth returns, descending to illuminate the gate of your stomach’s membrane. Softly intone:

*"Primordial Radiance pierces the mysterious,
Nine subtleties refine the form.
Four movements transform and change,
Following qi to alter life.
Birth and truth merge as one,
Streaming radiance through the eight darks.
I ride the auspicious day,
Ascending to report to the imperial numen.
Seeking immortality and ascension,
Eight radiant scenes converge.
Ten thousand wishes gather,
Attaining to steer the flowing chariot,
Ascending into the Nine Voids,
To pay homage to the Three Clarities."*

Having completed this, tilt the head back and swallow the twelve qi to conclude.

One who comprehends the Dao of the Primordial Radiance’s four transformations shall live three thousand years. After nine years of cultivation, they will share the same radiance as the perfected and ascend to fly through the Upper Clarity.

The Great Dao Lord of the Grand Clarity, the qi of the Primordial Radiance’s Jade Fusion, bears the taboo name *Fu Shanghe* and the style *Ling Youhui*, standing seventy million zhang in height. During the three months of winter, he dons the Nine Origins Celestial Crown, wears a nine-colored dragon robe, girds the Central Chapter of the Three Qi, fastens the Interwoven Numinous White Sash, and stands upon the Three Simplicities’ Clouds. His radiance shines brilliantly, dwelling above the Upper Clarity. Visualize him as returning to a height of three cun and two fen.

During the three months of spring, the Great Dao Lord of the Grand Clarity transforms into a three-headed phoenix, holding a white sash in its beak. Its body bears nine-colored feathers, resplendent with patterns that illuminate the Upper Clarity. Visualize him reverting to his true form.

During the three months of summer, the Great Dao Lord of the Grand Clarity transforms into a circular radiance of three months, its color crimson, swirling like a chariot’s wheel. Its luminosity shines brilliantly, dwelling above the Grand Clarity. Visualize him reverting to his true form.

During the three months of autumn, the Great Dao Lord of the Grand Clarity transforms into a radiance of purple, white, and yellow, its brilliance resplendent, illuminating the Upper Clarity. This is the qi of the Grand Clarity returning, whereupon one refines anew the essence of the Primordial Radiance’s Jade Fusion. Visualize him reverting to his true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Great Dao Lord of the Grand Clarity, always on the day of *Lichun*, bathe and enter the chamber. Face north, bow three times, and pay homage to the Dao Lord. Then face north again, sit upright, and click the teeth three times. Visualize the Great Dao Lord’s form and shadow following the four seasons, dwelling within the Upper Clarity’s Initial Palace, the Primordial Birth Precinct, the Six Harmonies Hamlet, and the Wind-Born Ward. His truth returns, descending to illuminate the gate of the root within your throat. Softly intone:

*"Grand Clarity scatters numinosity,
Nine refinements spout the elixir.
Golden radiance and jade talismans,
Five-colored streaming mists.
Above transforms, below unites,
Transforming the radiance of the Nine Heavens.
Myriad spirits refine in fusion,
Inner illumination achieves immortality.
[Entering the chamber] to assist the perfected,
I fly at dawn to the imperial court."*

Having completed this, tilt the head back and swallow the three qi to conclude.

One who comprehends this Dao shall not die. After nine years of cultivation, they will become a spirit immortal.

The August Primordial Purple Origin Lord, the qi of Primordial Fusion’s generation, bears the taboo name *Xing Jiexing* and the style *Yiqi Zhen*, standing ninety million zhang in height. During the three months of spring, he dons the Purple Origin Precious Coral Divine Crown, wears a three-colored tiger-patterned robe, girds the White Numinous Sash, and stands upon the Three Simplicities’ Clouds. His radiance shines brilliantly, penetrating the observation of the ten directions, dwelling within the Upper Clarity’s Eight Subtleties. Visualize him as returning to a height of nine cun and nine fen.

During the three months of summer, the August Primordial Purple Origin Lord transforms into a great immortal, his entire body golden, bearing a circular luminosity upon his neck. His patterns are resplendent, his radiance brilliant, illuminating the ten directions. Visualize him reverting to his true form.

During the three months of autumn, the August Primordial Purple Origin Lord transforms into a three-colored youth, clad in five-colored robes, holding a floral banner. His brilliance shines resplendently, illuminating the Upper Clarity. Visualize him reverting to his true form.

During the three months of winter, the August Primordial Purple Origin Lord transforms into a radiance of azure, emerald, and purple, its luminosity resplendent, illuminating the Upper Clarity. This is the qi of the August Primordial returning, whereupon one refines anew the essence of Primordial Fusion’s generation. Visualize him reverting to his true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Purple Origin Lord, always on the day of the *Tai Sui* and *Jiazi*, bathe and enter the chamber. Face south and bow once to pay homage to the Purple Origin Lord. Then face north, sit upright, and click the teeth three times to conclude. Visualize the Purple Origin Lord’s form and shadow following the four seasons, dwelling within the Upper Clarity’s Lofty Void Palace, the Layered Emptiness Precinct, the Cloudy Middle Hamlet, and the Divine Han Ward. His truth returns, descending to illuminate the source beneath the two nostrils within your Mud Pill Palace. Softly intone:

*"Purple August, Primordial Origin,
Dao unites with the mysterious void.
Three transformations, nine divisions,
Fusing and transforming the Grand Primordium.
Essence congeals, undispersed,
Dao’s numinosity and golden efflorescence.
Yellow ascends to observe the perfected,
Assisting the luminous jade scripture.
Celestial soul inspects qi,
Spirit ascends to the Purple Void.
Flying numinosity and streaming chariot,
Azure canopy and green carriage,
Conveying my body,
To pay homage at the Square Reservoir."*

Having completed this, swallow the qi nine times to conclude.

This is the wondrous Dao of the Supreme August. Secretly transmitted within the Vermilion Terrace, those who cultivate its method shall ascend to fly through the Upper Clarity. Lightly divulging the numinous writ... (the original text is incomplete).

chunks.original_text: 上清元始变化宝真上经 经名：上清元始变化宝真上经。 撰人不详，约出於南北期。 系摘录《龟山玄箓》上卷而成一卷。 底本出处：《万历续道藏》。 参校本：《上清元始变化宝真上经九灵太妙龟山玄箓》#1。 上清元始变化宝真上经 上清宝书，以九天建立之始，皆自然而生，与气同存，三景齐明，表见九天之上，太虚之中。 或结飞玄紫气，以成灵文，天书宛妙，文势曲折，字方一丈，难可寻详，自非九天中真王，莫能明其旨音。 九天真王以上虚元年，命玄都上真铸金为简，众圣明义，高上口诀，撰集灵篇，玉帝注笔，刻简成章。 以俯仰之格，皆有高下次第，禁限品目，悉出高圣之微旨也。 封於九天之上，太有宫中琼房之内，皆以西华玉女、素灵宫金晨紫童典卫之。 西龟之山，一曰龙山，乃九天之根纽，万气之渊府，在天西北之角，周回四十万里，高与玉清连界。 东南则接通阳之霞，上承青宫神虎之门； 西北则交寒穴之野，上通金阙神仙之庭； 南则极於太丹浮梨之乡，气协洞阳之光； 北则指於钩陈，交关华盖，气践广灵； 中央直衡玉京八达交风山顶。 平天三万里，悉涌金为墙，结玉为门，金台玉楼，十二神宫。 上有自然流精紫阙金华之堂，琼瑶之室，傍通九穴之洞，自生紫气之云，交带凤文，九色落陈。 崖生紫桂，岭秀琼林，结瑚为条，植玉为根，骞林树含实，赤子白环，三华耀葩於朱景，反香流芳於太玄，八气扇飙以长执，玉籁空唱而成音，龙嗥云楼，凤啸绝岭，毒兽万罗，长蛇千寻，神宫堂堂，云仙纷纷，巍巍元馆，触类吐津，盖元始之妙化，寔天元之灵根。 金华之堂，北窗上有自生紫气，结成玄文，字方一丈，垂芒焕明，天书宛妙，非可寻详。 九天丈人，昔上甲元年清斋云宫，宴景龟山，仍刻金简，缮书玄文，解其宿滞，演其灵音，记曰龟山丹皇飞玄紫文。 西王母以开皇元年正月上寅之日，乘虚泛灵，逸遨九霄，静斋龟山，上登自然流精紫阙金华琼堂，游观北窗，朝礼玄文，瞻崖思灵，心想上真。 於是妙感玄觉，丹心表明，时忽有天真大神，挟日带月，项负圆光，从群仙羽盖，乘飞舆紫云九精流霄，垂跪王母前称：九天凤官领仙王，姓上玄，字开明，奉元始天王命，使赍九天金书紫字青金丹黄之文，降授於王母焉。 锡号西元九灵上真仙母，封西龟之岳。 又授素书一卷，上真始生变化元录，总领仙籍，承统玉清。 又以青琼之板，给九天凤衣飞青羽，晨婴玉冠凤云之舄，神凤紫轮飞行羽盖二十四乘，五色仗幡命灵之节。 又以上宫金华玉女七百人，侍卫於仙母焉。 使治流精紫阙金华琼堂，一月三登玉清，再宴昆仑，五校众仙。 於是天真大神启授事毕，悉反驾玉宫。 仙母於时受命登座，告斋琼堂，命侍女王子登、董双成等，以神光锦巾盛受金书紫字青琼之板，青金丹皇锡文，上真始生变化元录，飞玄紫文，凡四事，封以丹皇之章，藏之於琼瑶之室。 命金华玉女、紫晨玉童各三十人，侍卫灵文。 依三天旧典俯仰之格，申告五帝五岳灵山河海正神，咸令一月五条至学人名，功过区别，随品奏言。 仙母常以八节之日，又一月五过，宴景云宫，时适五岳，历观河源，游盻八极。 当此之时，则五星出分，日月停光，百阳激电，流金焕精，天丁前驱，五老仗幡，仙母常乘九色之辇紫云飞轮，从天仙玉女各五千人。

**The Supreme Clarity Scripture of the Primordial Origin’s Transformations and Treasured True Essence**

**Scripture Title:** *The Supreme Clarity Scripture of the Primordial Origin’s Transformations and Treasured True Essence*. Author unknown, likely composed during the Northern and Southern Dynasties. Compiled as a single fascicle from the first volume of *The Mysterious Register of Mount Tortoise*. Base text from *The Wanli Continuation of the Daoist Canon*. Collated with *The Supreme Clarity Scripture of the Primordial Origin’s Transformations and Treasured True Essence, the Nine Numinous and Most Wondrous Mysterious Register of Mount Tortoise* #1.

---

**The Supreme Clarity Scripture of the Primordial Origin’s Transformations and Treasured True Essence**

The sacred scriptures of Supreme Clarity arose at the inception of the Nine Heavens, born of spontaneity and coexisting with qi. The Three Radiant Ones shone in unison, manifesting above the Nine Heavens and within the Great Void. At times, they coalesced into soaring dark-purple qi, forming numinous texts—celestial writings of ineffable subtlety, their strokes sinuous and intricate. Each character spanned a *zhang* in size, their details elusive; none but the Perfected Kings of the Nine Heavens could fathom their profound resonance.

In the first year of the *Shangxu* era, the Perfected Kings of the Nine Heavens commanded the Supreme Perfected Ones of the Mysterious Capital to cast golden tablets. The assembled sages clarified their meanings, and the Highest Oral Instructions were compiled into numinous chapters. The Jade Emperor inscribed them with his brush, engraving the tablets into scripture. Their structure—with its elevations and descents, ranks and prohibitions—all derived from the esoteric decrees of the Most High Sages. Sealed within the Jade Chamber of the Celestial Palace above the Nine Heavens, they were guarded by the Jade Maidens of the Western Florescence and the Purple Lads of the Golden Dawn of the Primordial Numinous Palace.

Mount Tortoise of the West—also called Dragon Mountain—serves as the root and pivot of the Nine Heavens, the abyssal repository of the myriad qi. Located at the northwest corner of the heavens, it spans four hundred thousand *li* in circumference, its summit contiguous with the Jade Clarity. To the southeast, it adjoins the rosy clouds of the Yang-Pervading Realm, ascending to the Gate of the Divine Tiger of the Azure Palace. To the northwest, it intersects the Frigid Wastes, rising to the Court of the Immortals of the Golden Portals. To the south, it extends to the Crimson Floating Pear Realm, its qi harmonizing with the radiance of the Cavernous Yang. To the north, it points toward the Celestial Enclosure, linking with the Canopy of Flowers, its qi traversing the Vast Numinous. At its center, it aligns directly with the Eightfold Crossroads of the Jade Capital atop the summit of the Intersecting Winds Mountain. Thirty thousand *li* of level heavens are walled in smelted gold and gated in carved jade, adorned with golden terraces, jade towers, and twelve divine palaces.

Above stand the naturally flowing Essence-Purple Towers and Golden Florescence Halls, chambers of chalcedony and jasper, flanked by nine cavernous grottoes. Spontaneous purple clouds arise, interwoven with phoenix-script, their nine hues cascading in array. Cliffs bear purple cassia, ridges flourish with jasper groves, their branches formed of coral, their roots of jade. The trees of the *qian* groves bear fruit, their boughs laden with white jade rings. The Three Florescence blossoms gleam in the crimson radiance, while reverse fragrance flows through the Great Mystery. The Eight Qi fan the whirlwinds, and jade flutes resound in the void, composing celestial music. Dragons roar upon cloud towers, phoenixes cry from perilous peaks. Venomous beasts gather in the thousands, serpents coil a thousand *xun* in length. Divine palaces stand majestic, cloud-borne immortals swarm in profusion. The towering Primordial Halls brim with emanations, for this is the wondrous transformation of the Primordial Origin, the true numinous root of the Celestial Origin.

Within the Golden Florescence Hall, above the northern window, a spontaneous purple qi coalesces into mysterious script. Characters a *zhang* in size descend in radiant splendor, their celestial writing of ineffable subtlety, beyond mortal comprehension.

In the first year of the *Shangjia* era, the Heavenly Venerable of the Nine Heavens fasted in the Cloud Palace and feasted in the radiance of Mount Tortoise. There, he inscribed golden tablets and transcribed the mysterious script, resolving its long-standing obscurities and expounding its numinous resonance. It was recorded as *The Crimson Sovereign’s Flying Dark-Purple Writ of Mount Tortoise*.

On the first *yin* day of the first month of the first year of the *Kaihuang* era, the Queen Mother of the West rode the void in numinous flight, soaring through the Nine Empyreans. She fasted upon Mount Tortoise and ascended the naturally flowing Essence-Purple Tower and Golden Florescence Jasper Hall. Gazing upon the northern window, she paid homage to the mysterious script, contemplating the cliffs in reverence and meditating upon the Supreme Perfected Ones. Thereupon, her wondrous perception awakened, and her cinnabar heart revealed its truth. Suddenly, a Great Divine Perfected One of Heaven appeared, girded with the sun and moon, a halo encircling his neck. Preceded by a retinue of feather-canopied immortals, he arrived upon a flying chariot of ninefold purple clouds, trailing auroral radiance. Kneeling before the Queen Mother, he announced: "I am the Perfected King of the Phoenix Palace of the Nine Heavens, surnamed Supreme Mystery, styled Open Brightness. By command of the Primordial Heavenly King, I bear the Nine Heavens’ Golden Writ in purple characters on azure-golden cinnabar tablets, to bestow upon the Queen Mother." He conferred upon her the title *Supreme Perfected Mother of the Nine Numinous Ones of the Western Origin* and enfeoffed her as the Peak of Western Tortoise. He also bestowed a plain writ containing *The Primordial Record of the Supreme Perfected One’s Transformations at Birth*, entrusting her with the oversight of the immortal registers and the succession of the Jade Clarity.

Additionally, he presented her with azure-jade tablets, a *feng*-robe of flying azure feathers, a Morning Infant Jade Crown, phoenix-cloud sandals, a divine phoenix-purple wheel, a flying feathered canopy of twenty-four carriages, and five-colored banners of numinous command. He further assigned seven hundred Jade Maidens of the Upper Palace’s Golden Florescence to attend the Perfected Mother, who was to govern the flowing Essence-Purple Tower and Golden Florescence Jasper Hall. Thrice each month, she would ascend to the Jade Clarity, twice feast upon Kunlun, and five times review the assembled immortals.

When the Great Divine Perfected One had completed his mission, he returned to his jade palace. The Perfected Mother then ascended her throne and addressed the assembly in the Jasper Hall. She commanded her attendants, the Jade Lad Deng and Dong Shuangcheng, to receive with reverence the golden writ in purple characters on azure-jade tablets, the azure-golden cinnabar writ of imperial bestowal, *The Primordial Record of the Supreme Perfected One’s Transformations at Birth*, and the *Flying Dark-Purple Writ*—four items in total—wrapped in a cinnabar-sovereign seal and enshrined within the chalcedony chamber. She assigned thirty Jade Maidens of the Golden Florescence and thirty Purple Dawn Jade Lads to guard the numinous script. Following the ancient statutes of the Three Heavens’ structural protocols, she reported to the Five Emperors, the Five Peaks, the numinous mountains, rivers, and seas, commanding their deities to submit the names of aspirants five times monthly, distinguishing merits and transgressions by rank for memorialization.

On each of the eight solar terms, and five times each month, the Perfected Mother feasted in the Cloud Palace, traversing the Five Peaks, surveying the sources of rivers, and gazing upon the eight directions. At such times, the Five Planets aligned, the sun and moon paused in their radiance, the hundred yangs discharged lightning, molten gold gleamed with essence, Heavenly Soldiers led the vanguard, and the Five Elders bore banners. The Perfected Mother ever rode her nine-hued chariot of purple-cloud flying wheels, attended by five thousand Jade Maidens of the Celestial Immortals.

chunks.original_text: 女则乘凤，男则策龙，飞仙羽服，皆手执华幡，笳箫鼓吹，百和合音，鸾唱凤啸，激朗云陈，华光交焕，三景合明，紫童扬香以却秽，神妃散华以灌真，天钧奏其旌盖，紫烟翳乎虚庭，玉景流盻於太空，神化威制於万灵。 当此之时，六天顺命，群凶束形，妖魔丧眼，天朗气清，盖高仙之妙观，摽丹皇之洞灵也。 龟山丹皇飞玄紫文 飞玄紫气凝灵根，纲维玉虚总万神，空中郁勃结自然，上有峻嶒十二传。 玉楼峨峨曜景云，流精紫阙带金轩。 琼堂玮铄铙八骞，中出青金九灵仙。 丹皇真母号精延，飞青羽晨婴冠。 左执玉节，右握灵幡，五色命魔，奉对帝尊。 把持符藉当生门，咀月嚼日噏玉泉。 离罗吐晖炼五魂，内充外溢绛府欣。 金光焕焕形正圆，从朔入金色沌沌，唯有开明晓此言。 日五月十精北元，刻见华盖领仙君。 紫气左回与斗运，历度四七入金门。 正是丹皇校万仙，有明此诀加精勤。 被形密思每令分，妙景感会得要文。 三年当审保长全，九年乘空致羽裙。 凤衣轻翔升龙山，俯仰九灵谒玉晨。 南极上元君曰：此结紫炁飞玄之文，刻书西龟山上，流精紫阙金华琼堂北窗之上，九天丈人目其篇，记曰龟山丹皇飞玄紫文。 西王母常所宝秘，其旨隐奥，皆是九天宛妙之韵，自无仙名，不得眄其篇目。 得者皆九天书录，名题龟山。 九天丈人目云：修其道，常以正月、二月、三月、四月、五月、六月、七月、八月、九月、十一月、十二月，一年十月； 月三日、五日、九日、十五日、二十五日，一月五过，清斋诵咏玄文一徧。 以夜半之后，露出中庭，仰伺北斗华盖之中，有紫云之气，从斗纲左回，历度二十八宿竟，还金门之上。 若在人中天阴无光，当於室内默念内思如上法，每令分明。 思毕，当心拜紫云四过，叩齿三通，仰祝曰： 天夜朗清，幽虚启真，流云徘徊，金华四褰，丹皇敷晖，灵飞紫轩，是夕开陈，青金授仙，成我上愿，体应自然，结命月华，保年日根，三灵合景，永停龙山，密夜清披，请如所言。 毕，便口引紫气二十八咽止。 行此三年，刻有神真降兆寝席也。 身有紫炁，映络一形，九天书名，必复上仙也。 九天丈人曰：天书万重，各论其妙，如此一事，亦足致灵真下降，振翮九霄，腾景玉清，游宴云宫也。 自非妙法，西王母亦不秘之於中衿，大有亦不明其禁限也。 极上元君曰：天有禁气之云，干於日月五星之分，在其方国，皆有合道之人，得仙之君也。 如此之候，其象则见。 九天丈人曰：得见此云，便依文礼祝，不必须当常日也。 勤加在意，刻得云降，升腾有会也。 正可封之於心，不得轻以示人，道泄则灵散，仙无由有感也。 元始锡西王母青金丹皇玉文 高上元始告灵九天太空祖宗。 西王母讳婉衿，皇天九灵之炁，混西金之魄，结紫云之胞骨，炼日精之晖，吐纳七曜之华，协晨霞而餐太阳凤髓，噏於月精兰脑，凝於玉根金藏，结络丹形，八缠紫心，表明於丹皇妙图，高列于帝轩，寝景灵岳，灰心上清，功济万品，惠溢有生，秉节独操，累劫长存。 故致高上曲华元始锡焉。 以婉衿有金真之德，锡禅西元九灵上真仙母，青金丹皇之号，封掌龟山，总领元录，依俯仰征青琼之板金书玉字，给九天凤衣飞青羽，晨婴玉冠凤云之舄，神凤紫轮飞行羽盖二十四乘，五色杖幡命灵之节，流金火铃夜光之烛，灭魔玉章九天诏信，卫以上宫西华玉女七百人，治西龟之山流精紫阙金华之宫，一月三登玉清，再宴昆仑，五校众仙，五岳河海十方灵官，莫不总制，依具以言。

Then the women rode phoenixes, the men mounted dragons, and the flying immortals in feathered robes each held floral banners. Reed pipes, flutes, drums, and winds blended in harmonious tones, while luan birds sang and phoenixes cried, their voices ringing through the cloud formations. Radiant lights intertwined, the Three Luminaries merged in brilliance. Purple youths wafted incense to dispel impurities, while divine consorts scattered blossoms to bathe the perfected. Heavenly chimes resounded beneath their banners, purple mists veiled the empty courtyard, jade effulgences streamed across the firmament, and numinous transformations subdued the myriad spirits.

At such times, the Six Heavens obeyed her command, all malevolent forces shrank in form, demons and monsters lost their sight, the heavens cleared, and the air grew pure—truly the wondrous spectacle of lofty immortals, the luminous numen of the Cinnabar Sovereign manifest in its full glory.

**The Cinnabar Sovereign of Tortoise Mountain’s Flying Mystery Purple Writ**
*Flying Mystery Purple Qi congeals the numinous root,*
*The net of Jade Clarity governs the myriad spirits.*
*In the void, it surges and coalesces of itself;*
*Above, twelve towering peaks stand in succession.*

*Jade towers soar resplendent in luminous clouds,*
*Flowing essence graces the purple palace with golden eaves.*
*The jasper hall gleams with the brilliance of the Eight Transcendents;*
*Within, the Nine Numinous Immortals of Azure Gold emerge.*

*The Cinnabar Sovereign True Mother is named Essence-Prolonging,*
*Clad in flying azure feathered robes, crowned with the Morning Infant’s diadem.*
*In her left hand she holds the jade scepter, in her right the numinous banner;*
*Five-colored spirits command the demons, attending the August Honored One.*

*Grasping talismans and registers at the Gate of Life,*
*She chews the moon and sucks the sun, inhaling jade springs.*
*The Net of Separation exhales radiance to refine the five souls;*
*Within, it fills and overflows, delighting the Crimson Palace.*

*Golden light shines resplendent, her form perfectly round.*
*From the new moon she enters the Metal phase, its color turbid and dim—*
*Only the Enlightened One at dawn speaks of this.*
*On the fifth day of the fifth month, the Northern Primordial’s essence,*
*The inscribed canopy appears, leading the immortals.*

*Purple Qi revolves leftward with the Dipper’s motion,*
*Passing through the four sevens to enter the Golden Gate.*
*Just then, the Cinnabar Sovereign reviews the myriad immortals;*
*Those who understand this secret must redouble their diligence.*

*Clothe your form and concentrate your thoughts, ever keeping them distinct;*
*When wondrous visions respond, grasp the essential writ.*
*After three years, you shall surely preserve your wholeness;*
*After nine years, you shall ascend through the void to don the feathered skirt.*

*Lightly soaring in phoenix robes, you shall ascend Dragon Mountain,*
*Gazing up and down to the Nine Numinous Ones, you shall pay homage to the Jade Dawn.*
*The Supreme Primordial Lord of the Southern Culmen declared:*
*This is the writ of congealed Purple Qi and Flying Mystery, inscribed upon the western Tortoise Mountain, flowing essence upon the northern window of the Purple Palace’s Golden Flower Jasper Hall. The Nine Heavens’ Celestial Venerable beheld its chapters and recorded it as the* Tortoise Mountain Cinnabar Sovereign’s Flying Mystery Purple Writ.

*The Queen Mother of the West ever treasured and concealed it; its purport is profound and recondite, all being the subtle rhymes of the Nine Heavens. Without immortal rank, one may not so much as glance at its title. Those who obtain it are all recorded in the Nine Heavens’ registers, their names inscribed upon Tortoise Mountain.*

*The Nine Heavens’ Celestial Venerable instructed:*
*Practice this Way during the ten months of the year—namely, the first through ninth months, and the eleventh and twelfth months. On the third, fifth, ninth, fifteenth, and twenty-fifth days of each month—five times monthly—purify yourself and recite the Mystery Writ once. After midnight, go forth into the central courtyard, gaze upward, and await the Purple Cloud Qi within the Canopy of the Northern Dipper. Observe it revolving leftward from the Dipper’s handle, passing through the twenty-eight lunar lodges in sequence, and returning above the Golden Gate. If the sky is overcast and no light appears, perform this inwardly within your chamber, visualizing the method as above with utmost clarity. Upon completing the visualization, bow four times toward the Purple Cloud, click your teeth thrice, and raise your gaze to pray:*

*This night is clear and bright, the hidden void reveals the true;*
*Flowing clouds drift and linger, golden flowers unfold on four sides.*
*The Cinnabar Sovereign spreads its radiance, the numinous flies in the purple chariot.*
*This evening, it unfolds and arrays itself; Azure Gold confers immortality.*
*Fulfill my supreme aspiration, may my body accord with spontaneity.*
*Bind my life to the moon’s essence, preserve the root of my years and days.*
*May the Three Numinous Ones merge in splendor, eternally abiding on Dragon Mountain.*
*In the secret night, I don pure vestments—grant my request as spoken.*

*Then draw the Purple Qi into your mouth and swallow it twenty-eight times. After three years of this practice, divine perfected beings shall descend as omens upon your sleeping mat. Your body shall be enveloped in Purple Qi, your form interwoven with its glow. Your name shall be inscribed in the Nine Heavens’ registers, and you shall surely ascend as an immortal.*

*The Nine Heavens’ Celestial Venerable said:*
*The heavens’ writs are myriad, each expounding its wonders. Even this single matter suffices to summon numinous perfected beings to descend, to shake their wings in the Nine Empyreans, to soar through the Jade Clarity, and to wander and feast in the Cloud Palace. Were it not a wondrous method, the Queen Mother of the West would not have concealed it within her inner robe, nor would the Great Existence have left its prohibitions unspoken.*

*The Supreme Primordial Lord of the Southern Culmen said:*
*The heavens possess clouds of forbidden Qi that encroach upon the divisions of the sun, moon, and five planets. In those regions and kingdoms, there are always those who accord with the Dao and lords who attain immortality. When such signs appear, their images become visible.*

*The Nine Heavens’ Celestial Venerable said:*
*Upon seeing such clouds, perform the rites and prayers according to the writ—there is no need to wait for an appointed day. Apply yourself diligently, and when the clouds descend, you shall ascend to meet them. Seal this within your heart; do not lightly show it to others. If the Dao is divulged, its numen scatters, and immortals shall have no means to respond.*

**The Highest Primordial Bestows the Azure Gold Cinnabar Sovereign Jade Writ upon the Queen Mother of the West**
*The Most High Primordial addressed the Numinous Nine Heavens and the Ancestral Void:*
*The Queen Mother of the West, whose name is Graceful Robe, is the Qi of the Nine Numinous Ones of the Heavens, the coalesced essence of the Western Metal, the embodied bones of Purple Cloud, the refined radiance of the sun’s essence. She inhales and exhales the splendor of the seven luminaries, harmonizes with the morning auroras to feast on the marrow of the sun’s phoenix, and sips the moon’s essence and orchid brain. It congeals within the jade root and golden storehouse, binding and weaving her cinnabar form, her purple heart entwined in eightfold coils. Manifest in the Cinnabar Sovereign’s wondrous chart, she is exalted among the imperial chariots, reposing in the numinous peaks, her heart ashen in the Upper Clarity. Her merits aid the ten thousand kinds, her kindness overflows all living beings. Holding fast to her singular integrity, she endures through kalpas unending. Thus did the Highest Primordial of the Curved Flower bestow upon her this writ.*

*For Graceful Robe’s virtue of Golden Perfection, he conferred upon her the title of Azure Gold Cinnabar Sovereign, the Transcendent Mother of the Nine Numinous Ones of the Western Primordial. He invested her with rulership over Tortoise Mountain, entrusting her with the governance of the primordial registers. In accordance with the rhythms of inhalation and exhalation, he granted her the Azure Jade Tablet inscribed in gold and jade script, the Nine Heavens’ phoenix robes of flying azure feathers, the Morning Infant’s jade crown and phoenix-cloud sandals, twenty-four chariots of divine phoenixes with purple wheels and flying feathered canopies, five-colored staffs and banners as tokens of command over the numinous, flowing-gold fire bells and night-shining candles, jade writs to extinguish demons and Nine Heavens’ imperial decrees as pledges. To guard her, he assigned seven hundred Jade Maidens of the Upper Palace and Western Flower, who attend her in the Flowing Essence Purple Palace and Golden Flower Palace on Western Tortoise Mountain. Thrice monthly she ascends to the Jade Clarity, twice she feasts on Kunlun. She reviews the multitudes of immortals, and the Five Peaks, rivers, seas, and the deities of the ten directions—none are beyond her governance, as fully set forth in this writ.*

chunks.original_text: 皇上开真，九道合明，变炼虚无，洞映上清，分形化景，四运顺生，我享其真，与〔真〕合灵，内结玉仙，外缠八冥，八景扶翼，运致丹軿，乘云驾烟，策御上清，飞行云房，朝谒帝京。 毕，仰咽九气止。 能知元始变化形景内讳秘名，则寿九百年。 修之九年，与神交颜，则能变景飞行太空。 高灵九天王，元太虚之气，讳上观洞，字运梵，形长九千万丈。 以秋三月，则头建金华之冠，衣云文锦袍，带九光流铃交灵紫绶，乘丹碧二色之云，坐则九色狮子，光明焕耀上清，思之还长七寸。 冬三月，高灵九天王则化形九头，头戴九日，一身衣九色斑纹凤衣，常乘青黄二色之云，坐则九色狮子，光明之辉炜晔，在上清上，思之还反真形。 春三月，九天王则化形分别为九人，口衔九月，衣凤文羽衣，常乘九色之云，坐则九色之烟，光明焕烂，在上清之上太虚之中，思之还反真形。 夏三月，九天王则化形一，为青紫丹红四色之光，光气混沌照九天，此则反形太虚之气，更受炼九天之精，思之还反真形。 凡修九天真王之道，常以冬节之日，沐浴入室，西向九拜朝九天王毕，还北向叩齿九通，思九天王各随四时形像，在上清金兰宫太清府开明乡通真里中，回真下映，入兆上元丹田之中，便微祝曰： 九灵元精，变炼上明，三合齐景，分气散形，出空入玄，上黄下青，历运回晨，参络朱軿，洞游高虚，回映我庭，混合真光，神化来生，能乘云浮，上戏上清。 〔毕〕，仰咽九气止。 修行九年，上感九天，刻得神真下降，授兆真书，自然得乘九色云舆，飞行上清。 玉真九天丈人，元紫虚之气，讳延世明，字系上连，形长九千万丈。 冬三月，则头建飞精百变之冠，九色流光自然锦，佩衣九元通真之策，常乘五色之云，坐则九色之烟，光明炜晔，在上清之上，思之还长九寸。 春三月，玉真九天丈人则化形为凤凰，一身九头，头戴九气玄精，衣九色斑文羽袍，常乘十二飞麟，坐则五色莲华之上，光明流曜百变之色，在上清之上紫虚之中，思之还反真形。 夏三月，玉真九天丈人则化形为龙身人头，头戴十二色光，衣青黄紫三色羽衣，口衔素绶，常乘九色之云，坐则五色狮子，光照上清，思之还反真形。 秋三月，玉真九天丈人则化形为紫绿二色之光，光气相绕如日月相沓，此则反形紫虚之气，更受炼九天之精，思之还反真形。 行玉真九天丈人之道，常以立冬之日，沐浴入室，西北向九拜九天丈人毕，还北向叩齿九通，思九天丈人各随四时形影，在上清丹灵宫开清府三合乡无明里中，回真下映，入兆洞房之中，便微祝曰： 九天上灵，元始自然，含炼八道，九真胎仙，中宝紫元，三素外缠，变景炼气，顺运流迁，洞化入微，我道早分，目招灵晖，心披五云，乘策入景，飞入帝晨。 毕，仰咽九气止。 知九天丈人变化形影内讳秘字，便名书九天，修之九年，得见真神，乘空飞行，上升玉清。 道根九天元父，元洞根之气，讳九灵导，字混大真，形长九千万丈。 春三月，头建七称朱玉之帻，无极宝天之冠，着九天凤衣神云凤舄，带素灵之绶，常乘碧霞飞舆，从十二飞龙，坐则九色华光，在玉清之上，光明百变，炜晔太空，思之还长九尺。

The August Supreme unfolds the true, the nine Dao converge in radiance, transforming and refining the void, penetrating and illuminating the *Upper Clarity*. His form divides and radiates in effulgent manifestations, the four seasons flow in harmony, and I partake of his truth, merging with the numinous. Within, the *Jade Immortal* coalesces; without, the *Eightfold Obscurity* entwines. The *Eight Effulgences* lend their wings, conveying the *Cinnabar Chariot*. Riding clouds and mounting mist, he urges his steed through the *Upper Clarity*, soaring through the *Cloud Chambers* to pay homage at the *Imperial Capital*. Upon completion, he tilts his head to swallow the nine qi and ceases.

One who knows the inner secret names of the *Primordial Commencement*’s transformations and luminous manifestations shall attain a lifespan of nine hundred years. After nine years of cultivation, one may commune with the divine in countenance and transform one’s effulgence to soar through the great void.

The *Lofty Numinous Nine-Heaven King*, the qi of the *Primordial Void*, bears the secret name *Upper Vision of the Cavern* and the style *Moving Brahma*, his form spanning ninety million *zhang*. In the three months of autumn, he dons a *Golden Flower Crown*, robes of cloud-patterned brocade, and a *Ninefold Radiant Tinkling Girdle* of interwoven purple cords. He rides clouds of cinnabar and azure hues, seated upon nine-colored lions, his luminosity resplendent in the *Upper Clarity*, visualized as seven inches in length. chunks.original_text: 夏三月，元父则化形一身九头，头戴九日，衣赤凤班文虎裘，带十二色绶，乘九色之凤，坐则黄白二气之上，光明焕虚，洞耀玉清之中，思之还反真形。 秋三月，元父则化形分为九人，同衣九色羽袍，带漫延龙渊之剑，虎头鞶囊交灵素绶，坐九气玄空之上，光明百变，焕曜玉清细微之内，洞根之中，思之还反真形。 冬三月，元父化形为日精之光，与紫晖相沓，此射元父反形道根之气，更受炼洞根之精，与玄母合变混沌二像之光，思之还反真形。 行元父之道，当以太岁之日，沐浴清斋入室，西北向朝九天元父九〔拜〕毕，还北向平坐，闭眼思九天父各随四时形影，在於九天之上太极琼宫玉宝之府丹灵乡洞元里中，回真下映，入兆上元昆仑之中，便微祝曰： 高上帝尊，元始大神，合真匡气，形秀紫天，乘云驾浮，络景八烟，回轮曲降，道荫我身，得乘霄軿，奉侍灵辕，今日八会，上愿开陈，所求所乞，靡不如恩，长享元吉，与帝同存，策御八景，飞升玉晨。 毕，仰咽九气止。 行之九年，则睹真形，元父降侧，与兆共言，授兆宝书九天上录，书名玉简，身登上清。 轻泄此道，没身鬼官，殃及七祖，长充河源。 道极九天玄母，元洞渊之气，讳负沌，字黄大覆，形长七千万丈。 以秋三月，头戴紫元玄虚宝冠，着青精神光锦绣霜罗九色之，华光十二色交灵紫绶，常乘紫云飞轮，从十二凤凰，三十六仙人，坐九色狮子，光明流焕，在上清之上，思之还长六寸六分。 冬三月，玄母则化形为人头鸟口，口衔月精，衣青精飞罗之，交带流苏紫绶，常乘十二色云，坐则百变之光，洞照上清细微之内，思之还反真形。 春三月，玄母则化形为凤身麟头，七色班烂，十二华光，流精交络，洞映上清细微之内，八冥之里，思之还反真形。 夏三月，玄母则化形为紫黄二色之光，如月之晖，五色流焕，洞映上清，此则玄母反形洞元之气，更受炼道极九阴之精，雌一合庆，化生万神，思之还反真形，九年则元父负籍於南阳，玄母降形於丹房。 修行玄母之道，当以本命之日，沐浴清斋入室，东南九拜朝玄母毕，还北向平坐叩齿九通，闭眼思九天玄母随四时形影，在九天之上琼林七映之宫玉宝洞元之府九光乡上清里中，回真下映，入兆脐下命门丹田宫中，便微祝曰： 三合五离，混化二元，气结凝神，神变合魂，雌一含真，胎息生门，阴精玄降，淘灌形源，炼化明景，灵秀自然，今日上告，玄母开陈，十二上愿，保成玉真，五形纳泽，骨炼玉仙，轻身飞腾，乘虚络烟，上造紫极，奉接神颜。 毕，仰咽三九气止。 行之九年，玄母感悦，二景交欢，即勅北帝，消灭死名，上奉九天记录紫篇，得睹真形，飞行上清。 轻泄我道，死充河源，七祖负役，十苦八难，刀山剑树，万劫不原，得者宝密，自然成仙。 皇老三天丈人，元洞虚之气，讳上定拔，字明梵宗，形长三千万丈。 以春三月，头建通精七宝珠冠，衣飞云流光紫锦之袍，佩单皇命神之章，常坐五色百变之光，炜烨奕奕，在上清之上洞虚之中，思之还长三寸三分。 夏三月，皇老三天丈人则化形为三头一躯，戴青黄绿三色之云，衣五色班文之袍，坐十二华光之上，思之还反真形。

chunks.original_text: 玉霄九回，神真散灵，六虚灌元。 高上流精，混合反胎，受炼化生，四度回周，我道莹明，太一勒录，元君记生，五符参差，布养我形，三部八景，运致紫軿，飞仙羽服，翠裙锦青，双珰结带，金符玉铃，真人降授，使我升清，乘空步虚，上谒帝庭。 毕，仰咽九气止。 此九天上道，秘於玉房，万劫一出。 上灵紫映九霄真王，元玉皇之气，讳灵瑞，字应观世，形长九千万丈。 以冬三月，头建金华飞天冠，衣日生流精文袍，佩流金凤玺，带百变交金之剑，立九色莲花紫云之中，光明洞照玉清之上，思之还长九寸九分。 春三月，九霄真王则变形，头戴九星，口衔金铃，手执日象，衣服如法，立紫云之上，光明焕焕，洞照上清，思之还反真形。 夏三月，九霄真王则变形为九人，并衣青羽之衣，头各带一月，各执九色麾幢，在紫云之上，思之还反真形。 秋三月，九霄真王变为青白玄三色之光，更相缠绕，如云之升，光明奕奕，洞照上清，此则反玉皇之气，更受炼上虚紫映之精，思之还反真形。 修行九霄真王之道，当以秋分、太岁之日，清斋入室，西北向九拜，朝真王毕，还北向叩齿九通，闭眼思真王各随四时形影，在玉清七映宫凤生府上虚乡化仙里，回真下映，入兆九户伏源上关之中，便微祝曰： 九道映明，紫霄分流，三气混沌，合真冥枢，玄灵布元，散化上虚，无英携老，白元度符，司命检生，五神灌躯，道合成真，元皇同俦，上参玄图，飞升太无。 毕，仰咽九气止。 此皇上秘道，藏於瑶台九曲玄房，依太真科，万劫一传。 自非玄挺妙质，名书九天，不得参知。 见是篇目，寿同劫年，修之九年，升飞上清。 轻泄灵文，身死失仙。 高上虚皇君，元上皇之气，讳幽造，字大法朗，形长七千万丈。 以冬三月，头建无上七曜宝冠，衣明光飞锦珠袍，佩丹皇玉章，常乘九色之云，坐九色狮子，光明焕曜，在玉清之上，思之还长七寸二分。 春三月，高上虚皇君则化形为人头龙身，九色班斓，戴日捧月，坐十二月华光，光明焕曜，在玉清之上，思之还反真形。 夏三月，高上虚皇君则化形为上皇仙形，项负圆光七十二色，衣百变光明锦衣，光明焕照千亿万重，思之还反真形。 秋三月，高上虚皇君则化形玄黄绿三色之光，更相缠绕如太素之行云，此则高上反上皇之气，更受炼高上之精，思之还反真形。 修行高上虚皇之道，当以九月九日、三月三日，沐浴清斋入室，北向平坐，心拜九过止。 还北向坐，叩齿九通，闭目内思高上虚皇随四时形影，在上清元宝宫金上府离合乡明光里，回真下映，入兆上元血液之府，便微祝曰： 九天离合，飞根结真，洞景上灵，黄云内缠，宝明斋映，落华生烟，镇固上元，映照我身，三宫保炼，六府光津，策御八景，玄老周旋，乘空步虚，出入无间，上辅高上，虚皇帝臣，八会庆纳，请如所陈。 毕，仰咽九炁止。 此高上秘道，变化混生，知者与高上齐真，修之九年，飞行玉清。 轻泄七祖充责，身役河源，依九天之科，不得入仙。 紫虚高上元皇道君，元明皇之气，讳明上基，字飞冥范，形长五千万丈。 以春三月，头建紫元通天宝冠，衣青绿黄三色锦袍，佩招真玉策，带流光凤章，常乘紫碧二色之云，坐十二色莲华之上，光明障晔，在上清之中紫虚之内，思之还长五寸五分。

chunks.original_text: 夏三月，高上元皇道君则变形，色如黄金，项负圆轮十二光，衣七十二条九彩飞天之衣，坐九色狮子之上，思之还反真形。 秋三月，高上元皇道君则变形为凤头人躯，衣九色斑文虎衣，坐五色云上，思之还反真形。 冬三月，高上元皇道君则变形为碧皂黄三色之光，更相缠绕在紫虚之中，此则反明皇之气，更受炼紫虚之精，思之还反真形。 修行高上元皇之道，当以太岁之日，沐浴入室，南向心拜三过，朝元皇毕，还北向叩齿十二通，闭眼内思高上元皇道君随四时形影，在上清金灵宫丹神府元洞乡通耀里，回真下映，入兆通神之户，便微祝曰： 明皇元道，高上紫元，三变九合，结成洞门，朱精烂绮，飞生黄云，五符固死，保命长存，回真混合，使我成神，三宫安镇，九孔结仙，四时变化，与帝合真。 毕，仰咽九气止。 此高上秘密之道，三变九炼，自然成真。 得行〔其〕法，九年飞行，与神合形。 轻泄漏慢，九祖充责，身役幽泉，长谢四极，不得入仙。 上皇玉虚君，元紫皇之气，讳明世，字典常清，形长三千万丈。 以夏三月，头建通精七宝华冠，衣九象飞云锦，佩丹文紫章，常立紫气之云七色莲华，光明炜晔，洞照上清，思之还长三寸三分。 秋三月，上皇玉虚君则变形一面四眼，身为凤躯，九色斓斑，在黄白红三气之中，立五色狮子之上，思之还反真形。 冬三月，上皇玉虚君则变形为男子，手执五色之华，衣五色之衣，在紫云芝之上，思之还反真形。 春三月，上皇玉虚君则变形为黄赤青三色之光，混沌状如浮云，在紫虚之内，此则上皇反玉虚之气，更受炼紫皇之精，思之还反真形。 凡修行玉虚君之道，当以八节之日，清斋东向三拜，朝玉虚毕，还北向叩齿三通，闭眼内思上皇玉虚君随四时形影，在上清朱精宫生真府太丹乡三宝里，回真下映，入兆泥丸后门之中，便微祝曰： 玄明紫皇，八气飞空，幽幽冥冥，混化十方，敷灵演真，焕曜金光，紫微炼精，结成仙容，八景腾飞，乘云驾空，控辔太虚，逍遥上宫。 毕，仰咽七气止。 此上皇金匮秘道，有名书紫简，刻图丹台，当得此文，修行九年，飞行上清。 轻泄秘要，身役鬼官，不得入仙。 三元太明上皇君，元虚皇之气，讳寂欣平，字灵劫化，形长七千万丈。 秋三月，头建丹华紫曜飞天冠，衣五色云罗之袍，佩流金火铃，带神虎玉章，常立五色紫云之上，光明炜晔七十二变，照明上清，思之还长七寸二分，太明上皇君以冬三月，则化形人头龙身，五色玄黄，在紫虚之上，立九色云光绝空之中，思之还反真形。 太明上皇君以春三月，则化形为三月之晖，流光烂照上清之中，紫虚之内，思之还反真形。 太明上皇君以夏三月，则化为赤白二色之光，如太素之云，在紫虚之中，此则太明上皇君反三元之气，更受炼虚皇之精，思之还反真形。 修行上皇君之道，常以本命、太岁之日，沐浴入室，南向心拜太明上皇君毕，还北向叩齿三通，闭眼思太明上皇君随四时形影，在上清紫融宫生真府七相乡六元里中，回真下映，入兆左方融生宫中，便微祝曰： 三元太明，洞景朱灵，玄气散真，混合元精，帝一变化，保命黄宁，八气飞腾，六宫常生，玄老同符，我道已明，三光翼景，羽服郁青，策辔丹舆，飞入月庭。

In the three months of summer, the Lofty Primordial Emperor Dao Lord transforms his form, his color like molten gold, his neck bearing a twelve-rayed circular wheel. He wears a robe of seventy-two strips in nine hues of flying celestial patterns, seated upon a nine-colored lion. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of autumn, the Lofty Primordial Emperor Dao Lord transforms his form into one with a phoenix head and human body, clad in a nine-colored tiger-patterned robe. He sits upon five-colored clouds, and when visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of winter, the Lofty Primordial Emperor Dao Lord transforms into three intertwining lights of azure, black, and yellow, coiling within the Purple Void. This is the reversion to the qi of the Radiant Emperor, where he further refines the essence of the Purple Void. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Dao of the Lofty Primordial Emperor, on the day of the Great Year Star, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing south, bow thrice in reverence, then complete the audience with the Primordial Emperor. Turn north, knock the teeth twelve times, close the eyes, and inwardly visualize the Lofty Primordial Emperor Dao Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Golden Numinous Palace of the Highest Clarity, within the Cinnabar Spirit Prefecture of the Primordial Grotto Realm, in the Radiant Passage of Returning Truth. His radiance descends to illuminate one’s spirit portal. Then softly invoke:

*"Radiant Emperor, Primordial Dao,
Lofty Purple Primordial, thrice-transformed, nine-fold merged,
Knit the Grotto Gate’s formation.
Crimson essence gleams resplendent,
Flying forth in yellow clouds.
Five talismans secure deathlessness,
Preserve life’s enduring span.
Returning truth blends in union,
Let me attain divine transformation.
Three Palaces settled in peace,
Nine Orifices knit as immortal.
Four seasons’ changes align,
With the Emperor’s true merging."*

When finished, tilt the head back and swallow nine breaths to conclude.

This is the secret Dao of the Lofty Primordial, where three transformations and nine refinements naturally perfect the true. Those who practice this method for nine years will soar in flight, merging form with spirit. Should one lightly divulge or neglect its secrecy, nine generations will bear the burden, the body enslaved in the Dark Springs, forever severed from the Four Poles, barred from attaining immortality.

The Supreme Emperor Jade Void Lord is the qi of the Primordial Purple Emperor, named *Bright Eon*, styled *Eternal Clarity*. His form spans three thousand myriad leagues. In the three months of summer, he wears the Seven Treasures Flowered Crown of Penetrating Essence, robes of nine-phoenix flying-cloud brocade, and bears the Cinnabar-Script Purple Seal. He constantly stands upon seven-colored clouds and lotus, his radiance blazing resplendent, illuminating the Highest Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to a height of three inches and three fen.

In the three months of autumn, the Supreme Emperor Jade Void Lord transforms into a form with one face and four eyes, his body that of a phoenix, nine-colored and variegated, amid yellow, white, and red qi. He stands upon a five-colored lion, and when visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of winter, the Supreme Emperor Jade Void Lord transforms into a man holding five-colored blossoms, clad in five-colored robes, standing upon purple cloud fungi. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of spring, the Supreme Emperor Jade Void Lord transforms into three lights of yellow, red, and azure, chaotic as drifting clouds, within the Purple Void. This is the Supreme Emperor’s reversion to the qi of the Jade Void, where he further refines the essence of the Purple Emperor. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Dao of the Jade Void Lord, on the days of the Eight Nodal Points, purify the fast and face east, bowing thrice. After completing the audience with the Jade Void Lord, turn north, knock the teeth three times, close the eyes, and inwardly visualize the Supreme Emperor Jade Void Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Vermilion Essence Palace of the Highest Clarity, within the Life-True Prefecture of the Great Cinnabar Realm, in the Three Treasures Passage. His truth returns, descending to illuminate the Mud Pill Palace’s rear gate within oneself. Then softly invoke:

*"Mysterious Radiance, Purple Emperor,
Eight qi soar through the void.
Profound and obscure,
Transforming the Ten Directions.
Unfolding numinous truth,
Resplendent with golden radiance.
Purple Tenuity refines essence,
Knit the immortal countenance.
Eight Sceneries ascend in flight,
Riding clouds, driving through the void.
Grasping the reins of Great Emptiness,
Carefree in the Highest Palace."*

When finished, tilt the head back and swallow seven breaths to conclude.

This is the secret Dao of the Supreme Emperor’s Golden Casket, inscribed upon purple slips, its diagrams carved upon the Cinnabar Terrace. Those who obtain this text and practice for nine years will soar in flight to the Highest Clarity. Should one lightly divulge its essentials, the body will be enslaved by ghostly officials, barred from attaining immortality.

The Three Primordials Great Radiance Supreme Emperor is the qi of the Primordial Void Emperor, named *Silent Joyful Peace*, styled *Numinous Kalpa Transformation*. His form spans seven thousand myriad leagues. In the three months of autumn, he wears the Cinnabar Flower Purple Radiance Flying Celestial Crown, robes of five-colored cloud gauze, bears the Flowing Gold Fire Bell, and girds the Divine Tiger Jade Seal. He constantly stands upon five-colored purple clouds, his radiance blazing through seventy-two transformations, illuminating the Highest Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to a height of seven inches and two fen.

In the three months of winter, the Great Radiance Supreme Emperor transforms into a form with a human head and dragon body, five-colored and mysterious yellow, standing above the Purple Void, amid nine-colored cloud lights in the boundless void. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of spring, the Great Radiance Supreme Emperor transforms into the radiance of the third month, streaming light resplendent within the Highest Clarity and the Purple Void. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the three months of summer, the Great Radiance Supreme Emperor transforms into two lights of red and white, like clouds of primordial simplicity, within the Purple Void. This is the Great Radiance Supreme Emperor’s reversion to the qi of the Three Primordials, where he further refines the essence of the Void Emperor. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To practice the Dao of the Supreme Emperor, on the days of one’s life-star and the Great Year Star, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing south, bow in reverence to the Great Radiance Supreme Emperor, then turn north, knock the teeth three times, close the eyes, and visualize the Great Radiance Supreme Emperor’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Purple Fusion Palace of the Highest Clarity, within the Life-True Prefecture of the Seven Aspects Realm, in the Six Primordials Passage. His truth returns, descending to illuminate the left Fusion Life Palace within oneself. Then softly invoke:

*"Three Primordials, Great Radiance,
Vermilion Numinous Grotto Scenery.
Mysterious qi disperses truth,
Merging with primordial essence.
Emperor Unity transforms,
Preserving life in yellow peace.
Eight qi ascend in flight,
Six Palaces ever flourish.
Mysterious Elder in accord,
My Dao now clear.
Three Lights wing the Scenery,
Feathered robes lush and azure.
Grasping the reins of the cinnabar chariot,
I fly into the Moon Court."*

chunks.original_text: 毕，仰咽十二气止。 得修此道，则名书九天，上真降席，飞行玉清。 轻慢泄漏，身役鬼官，不得入仙。 皇上万始先生，元上皇之气，讳幽朗兰，字通大范，形长九千万丈。 冬三月，头建丹肠日精之冠，衣赤云明光锦袍，佩金虎凤文，带丹皇紫章，常乘白素之云，坐五色狮子，光明流焕，照映上清，思还长二寸一分。 春三月，万始先生则变形为人躯三头凤凰，衣九色斑文虎衣，常立十二华光，思之还反真形。 夏三月，万始先生则变形为三日之晖，紫光〔八〕芒，烂映焕明，在上清之上，十二色莲华之中，思之还反真形。 秋三月，万始先生〔则化〕为青赤紫三色之光，更相缠绕如日之轮，此则反皇上之气，更受炼上皇之精，思之还反真形。 修行万始先生之道，常以本命、八节之日，沐浴入室，北向心拜先生毕，叩齿三通，闭眼思先生随四时形影，在上清融华宫金魂府明灵乡上张里中，回真下映，入兆右方阴极宫中，微祝曰： 万始三精，散气九微，上景登〔正〕，明道四飞，玄母开愿，八间解怀，保录中元，帝真徘徊，变化三形，体无常衰，混合光象，日月齐晖，飞登玄宫，升入紫微。 毕，仰咽九炁止。 此高玄妙秘黄房宝文，得见其篇，书名九天，修行飞仙，白日升天。 上皇先生紫晨君，元高元之气，讳欣平渊，字道元极，形长九千万丈。 春三月，头建通天宝晨冠，衣七色流明云光珠袍，佩上相制灵之符，带混真东蒙之策，坐九色苍龙，在青云之上，光明流曜，洞照上清，思之还长九寸九分。 夏三月，化形龙头人身，五色斑斓，文彩焕曜，在紫云之中，光明彻照，映朗十方，思之还反真形。 秋三月，化形人〔头〕龙身，九色斑烂，文彩光明，洞照上清，思之还反真形。 冬三月，化形青黑二色之光，更相混合，光明洞曜，映照上清，此则反上皇之气，更受炼元高元之精，思之还反真形。 修行紫晨君之道，常以立春之日，东向九拜朝紫晨，还北向叩齿九通，思紫晨君随四时形影，在玉清紫玄上宫朱映府金精乡化灵里中，回真下映，入兆肝之上门，微祝曰： 上皇散灵，紫晨纳精，三华洞发，四度鲜明，流真交庆，回映我庭，三元混合，我道以成，仙衣羽服，锦裳飞青，〔九龙〕策辔，飞行上灵。 〔毕〕，仰咽九气止。 紫虚皇上太帝君，元洞元之气，讳灵明谷，字太范宗，长八千万丈。 夏三月，建九气流精紫曜之冠，衣九色无缝自然之，佩七元交光之章，带元皇命真之策，坐神凤之上绛云之内，光明炜晔，洞照上清，思之还长八寸八分。 秋三月，化形凤头人形，九色班斓，文彩光明，〔立〕莲华之上，在素云之中，思之还反真形。 冬三月，化〔形〕人头凤身，口衔火铃，文彩焕烂，洞照上清，思之还反真形。 春三月，化形为青赤二色之光，光明赫赫，照明上清，此则反紫虚之气，更受炼元洞精之精，思之还反真形。 修行太帝君之道，当以立夏之日，入室南向八拜，朝太帝君，还北向叩齿九通，思太帝君随四时形影，在玉清变云宫中丹曜府金华乡日精里中，回真下映，入兆心房上关，微祝曰： 紫虚吐精，皇上纳气，二元交庆，混合齐契，流精濯灌，泽洒九外，是日上吉，我享元泰，玉华流溢，洗尘扫秽，六俯开清，身无毫翳，明道八景，辅成仙位。
