Those who cultivate this Dao will have their names inscribed in the Nine Heavens, with Perfected Ones descending to their seat, soaring through the Jade Clarity. Those who treat it with levity or leak its secrets will be conscripted into ghostly offices and barred from immortality.

The August Supreme Venerable Master of the Myriad Beginnings is the qi of the Primordial August Supreme. His taboo name is Youlang Lan, and his style is Tong Da Fan. His form measures ninety million zhang in height. During the three months of winter, he wears a cinnabar-bowel sun-essence crown upon his head, dons a robe of red-cloud luminous brocade, and bears a golden tiger-phoenix insignia. He girds himself with a cinnabar-august purple seal, ever riding white plain clouds and seated upon a five-colored lion. His radiance flows and shines, illuminating the Highest Clarity. When visualized, he returns to a height of two cun and one fen.

During the three months of spring, the Venerable Master of the Myriad Beginnings transforms his form into a three-headed phoenix with a human torso, clad in a nine-colored tiger robe of mottled patterns. He constantly stands within twelve resplendent lights. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

During the three months of summer, the Venerable Master of the Myriad Beginnings transforms into the radiance of three suns, with purple light of eight rays, blazing and luminous, residing above the Highest Clarity amidst twelve-colored lotus blossoms. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

During the three months of autumn, the Venerable Master of the Myriad Beginnings transforms into a tri-colored light of azure, red, and purple, intertwining like the wheel of the sun. This is the reversion of the August Supreme’s qi, whereupon one further refines the essence of the August Supreme. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Venerable Master of the Myriad Beginnings, on the days of one’s life-destiny and the eight solar nodes, bathe and enter the chamber. Facing north, prostrate with the heart and bow to the Master. Upon completion, knock the teeth three times, close the eyes, and visualize the Master’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Highest Clarity’s Fusion Florescence Palace, within the Golden Soul Prefecture’s Bright Numinous Realm of the Upper Zhang Ward. His truth returns, descending to illuminate the right Yin-Ultimate Palace within oneself. Then softly invoke:

*"Myriad Beginnings’ three essences,
Nine subtleties of dispersed qi.
Upper Scenery ascends to rectitude,
Four flights illumine the Dao.
Mysterious Mother unfolds her vow,
Eight intervals unbind the heart.
Preserve the records of the Middle Origin,
August Perfected lingers in circuit.
Transforming three forms,
The body knows no constant decay.
Merging with luminous images,
Sun and moon shine as one.
Soaring to the Mysterious Palace,
Ascending into the Purple Tenuity."*

Upon completion, raise the head and swallow the nine qi to conclude.

This is the wondrous and arcane treasure scripture of the Yellow Chamber. Those who behold its chapters will have their names inscribed in the Nine Heavens, cultivating to become flying immortals and ascending to heaven in broad daylight.

The Purple Dawn Lord of the August Supreme Venerable Master is the qi of the Primordial Lofty Primordial. His taboo name is Xinping Yuan, and his style is Dao Yuan Ji. His form measures ninety million zhang in height. During the three months of spring, he wears a Heaven-Penetrating Treasure Dawn Crown upon his head, dons a robe of seven-colored flowing luminous cloud-pearl, bears the talisman of the Supreme Minister’s Numinous Control, and girds himself with the Eastern Meng’s Primal Fusion reins. He sits upon a nine-colored azure dragon amidst green clouds. His radiance flows and shines, penetrating the Highest Clarity. When visualized, he returns to a height of nine cun and nine fen.

During the three months of summer, he transforms into a dragon-headed human form, five-colored and mottled, with patterns resplendent and luminous, residing within purple clouds. His radiance pierces and illuminates, casting brightness across the ten directions. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

During the three months of autumn, he transforms into a human-headed dragon-bodied form, nine-colored and resplendent, with patterns luminous and bright, penetrating the Highest Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

During the three months of winter, he transforms into a dual-colored light of azure and black, intermingling. His radiance penetrates and shines, illuminating the Highest Clarity. This is the reversion of the August Supreme’s qi, whereupon one further refines the essence of the Primordial Lofty Primordial. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Purple Dawn Lord, on the day of the Beginning of Spring, enter the chamber and face east to prostrate nine times in homage to the Purple Dawn. Then face north, knock the teeth nine times, and visualize the Purple Dawn Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Jade Clarity’s Purple Mystery Upper Palace, within the Vermilion Radiance Prefecture’s Golden Essence Realm of the Transformed Numinous Ward. His truth returns, descending to illuminate the Upper Gate above one’s liver. Then softly invoke:

*"August Supreme disperses numinosity,
Purple Dawn receives essence.
Three Floras burst forth in the Grotto,
Four Measures shine with fresh clarity.
Flowing truth exchanges felicity,
Reflecting back to illuminate my court.
Three Origins merge as one,
My Dao is thus accomplished.
Immortal robes and feathered garments,
Brocaded skirts take flight in azure.
Grasping the reins of nine dragons,
I soar through the Upper Numinous."*

Upon completion, raise the head and swallow the nine qi to conclude.

The Supreme Emperor Lord of the Purple Void August Supreme is the qi of the Primordial Cavernous Primordial. His taboo name is Lingming Gu, and his style is Tai Fan Zong. His form measures eighty million zhang in height. During the three months of summer, he wears a Nine Qi Flowing Essence Purple Radiance Crown upon his head, dons a nine-colored seamless natural robe, bears the Seven Origins Interlaced Light Seal, and girds himself with the August Primordial Life-True reins. He sits upon a divine phoenix amidst crimson clouds. His radiance blazes and shines, penetrating the Highest Clarity. When visualized, he returns to a height of eight cun and eight fen.

During the three months of autumn, he transforms into a phoenix-headed human form, nine-colored and mottled, with patterns luminous and bright, standing upon a lotus blossom amidst plain clouds. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

During the three months of winter, he transforms into a human-headed phoenix-bodied form, mouth holding a fire bell, with patterns resplendent and bright, penetrating the Highest Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

During the three months of spring, he transforms into a dual-colored light of azure and red, radiant and brilliant, illuminating the Highest Clarity. This is the reversion of the Purple Void’s qi, whereupon one further refines the essence of the Primordial Cavernous Essence. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Dao of the Supreme Emperor Lord, on the day of the Beginning of Summer, enter the chamber and face south to prostrate eight times in homage to the Supreme Emperor Lord. Then face north, knock the teeth nine times, and visualize the Supreme Emperor Lord’s form shifting with the four seasons, residing in the Jade Clarity’s Transformed Cloud Palace, within the Vermilion Radiance Prefecture’s Golden Florescence Realm of the Sun Essence Ward. His truth returns, descending to illuminate the Upper Pass above one’s heart chamber. Then softly invoke:

*"Purple Void exhales essence,
August Supreme receives qi.
Two Origins exchange felicity,
Merging in perfect harmony.
Flowing essence washes and irrigates,
Dew scatters to the nine beyond.
This day is supremely auspicious,
I partake of the Primordial Great Peace.
Jade Florescence flows and overflows,
Washing away dust and sweeping filth.
Six Obscurities open to clarity,
The body bears no speck of shadow.
Illumining the Dao of the Eight Sceneries,
Assisting to complete the immortal rank."*

chunks.original_text: 仰咽灵芝，还童反艾，肉轻骨飞，升入无际。 〔毕〕，仰咽八气止。 紫虚皇老上帝君，元洞精之气，讳虚盈，字元衡豁，长六千万丈。 秋三月，建金华七跃之冠，衣云文日精锦袍，佩皇天杖幡，带九光云章绶，立素云之中，坐七色狮子，光明流焕，洞映上清，思之还长六寸六分。 冬三月，化形虎头人身，黄白锦袍，文彩明曜，立玄云之中，坐九色，灵照十方，思之还反真形。 春三月，化形人头虎身，九色斑斓，光彩焕焕，照明上清，在紫虚上清之中，思之还反真形。 夏三月，化形为赤白二色之光，光明奕奕，照明四方，此则反紫虚之气，更受炼元洞之精，思之还反真形。 修行上帝君之道，常以立秋之日，入室西向六拜，朝上帝君毕，还北向，叩齿十二通，思上帝君随四时形影，在玉清金门宫治精府三练乡九变里中，回真下映，入兆胇宫中节间，微祝曰： 皇老开张，四运改灵，炼度三关，变化饰形，是日庆贺，万气交并，太上度符，〔司命〕典生，削灭死根，勒录上清，上享元吉，靡不利贞，寿同三光，与真齐灵，得乘飞景，造礼帝庭。 毕，仰咽十二气止。 玄虚太真洞景君，元洞融之气，讳游上飞，字玄开梁，长五千万丈。 冬三月，建无上七曜宝冠，衣朱玉文明光飞锦，佩丹皇玉帝章，带招仙之剑，在玄虚之中，立五色狮子之上，光明焕曜，映照上清，思之还长五寸五分。 春三月，化形为仙人，色如金刚，项负宝〔圆〕，衣龟文大衣，光照十方在青云之中，思之还反真形。 夏三月，化形为灵龟，三百六十文章，口衔七星，坐华盖之下玄云之上，光明奕奕，照映上清，思之还反真形。 秋三月，化形为白黑二色之光，光色沌沌如玉之精，此则反玄虚之气，更受炼元洞融之精，思之还反真形。 修行洞景君之道，常以立冬之日，入室北向五拜，朝洞景君，叩齿三通，思洞景君在玉清琼容〔宫〕太丹府朱雀乡崖中里中，回真下映，入兆肾府双关之内，微祝曰： 洞真高清，四运炼仙，道合中元，变化自然，流津玄洒，庆布我身，上享元吉，利贞受恩，太一度符，元君科山，绝灭死尸，斩断胞根，八景辅翼，总录万神，降致云舆，运我升晨。 毕，仰咽五气止。 行之八年，刻得玄升，中真降见，授兆真经宝章。 皇上玉帝，元高晨之气，讳大宁，字大幽始，长三千万丈。 春三月，建七宝珠冠，衣九色虎衣，佩金虎凤文，带神虎玉章，乘七元之精，立朱雀之上，十二华光，焕明玉清洞虚之中，思之还长三寸三分。 夏三月，化形项负七色宝盖，手把斗星，立日晖之中，光明炜晔，在上清之上，思之还反真形。 秋三月，化形人头，为朱雀口，衔日象，立紫云之中，华盖之下，光明映照上清，思之还反真形。 冬三月，化形为玄黄苍三色之光，更相缠绕在紫虚之中，则玉帝反皇上之气，更受炼高晨之精，思之还反真形。 修行玉帝之道，常以月一日、十五日，沐浴入室，东向心拜，朝玉帝毕，还北向叩齿十二通，闭眼思皇上玉帝随四时形影，在上清洞云宫雾仙府仙变乡定微〔里〕中，回真下映，入兆两眉中间，微祝曰： 明上帝皇，腾景高微，九变紫元，四气炼晖，三合中宫，五化徘徊，混合帝一，万气总归，安灵元室，镇固九扉，三部八景，齐真相随，共乘云龙，升我高飞，长享帝籍，亿亿不衰，毕，仰咽九气止。

The Purple Void August Elder Lord of the Supreme, the primordial qi of the Primal Cavern’s Essence, bears the taboo name *Xu Ying* and the style *Yuanheng Huo*, standing sixty million *zhang* in height. In the three months of autumn, he dons the Seven-Leap Golden Florescence Crown, robes himself in cloud-patterned Sun Essence brocade, wears the August Heaven Staff-Pennant, and girds the Nine Radiance Cloud Seal Cord. In the three months of winter, he transforms into a tiger-headed, human-bodied form, clad in yellow-and-white brocade, his patterned radiance resplendent. Standing amidst dark clouds, seated upon a nine-hued [beast], his numinous illumination pervades the ten directions. Envision him and he returns to his true form. In the three months of spring, he transforms into a human-headed, tiger-bodied form, nine-hued and mottled, his radiance blazing brilliantly, illuminating the Upper Clarity. Amidst the Purple Void’s Upper Clarity, envision him and he returns to his true form. In the three months of summer, he transforms into a radiance of red and white hues, its luminosity effulgent, illuminating the four directions. This is the reversion of the Purple Void’s qi, whereupon he further receives the refinement of the Primal Cavern’s Essence. Envision him and he returns to his true form.

To practice the Way of the Supreme Lord, always on the day of *Liqiu* (Beginning of Autumn), enter the chamber, face west, and bow six times. After paying homage to the Supreme Lord, turn to face north, click the teeth twelve times, and envision the Supreme Lord shifting his form with the four seasons, residing in the Jade Clarity’s Golden Gate Palace, within the Essence Prefecture’s Three Refinements Village of the Nine Transformations Ward. His truth returns, descending to illuminate the central node within one’s lung chamber. Then softly invoke:

*"August Elder unfolds and expands,
Four movements alter the numinous.
Refining and transcending the Three Passes,
Transforming and adorning the form.
On this day of felicitous celebration,
Myriad qi intermingle and merge.
The Supreme bestows the talisman,
[The Controller of Destiny] governs life.
Severing the roots of death,
Inscribing the register of Upper Clarity.
Supremely auspicious above,
None fail to attain upright prosperity.
Longevity matches the Three Luminaries,
Spiritual power equals the Perfected.
Attaining the ascent of flying radiance,
I present myself at the Imperial Court."*

[Conclude.] Cease the upward swallowing of the twelve breaths.

Amidst the Mysterious Void, standing upon a five-hued lion, his luminous brilliance blazes and shines, illuminating the Upper Clarity. Envision him as five *cun* and five *fen* in length. In the three months of spring, he transforms into an immortal, his complexion like *vajra*, his neck bearing a precious [orb], clad in a tortoise-patterned great robe. His light illuminates the ten directions amidst blue-green clouds. Envision him and he returns to his true form. In the three months of summer, he transforms into a numinous tortoise, its three hundred and sixty patterned markings, mouth holding the Seven Stars. Seated beneath a floral canopy upon dark clouds, his luminosity effulgent, he illuminates the Upper Clarity. Envision him and he returns to his true form. In the three months of autumn, he transforms into a radiance of white and black hues, its luminous essence turbid and resplendent like jade’s essence. This is the reversion of the Mysterious Void’s qi, whereupon he further receives the refinement of the Primal Cavern’s Fusion Essence. Envision him and he returns to his true form.

After paying homage to the Cavern Radiance Lord, click the teeth three times, and envision the Cavern Radiance Lord residing in the Jade Clarity’s Jasper Countenance [Palace], within the Great Cinnabar Prefecture’s Vermilion Bird Village of the Cliff Ward. His truth returns, descending to illuminate the interior of one’s kidney府’s paired passes. Then softly invoke:

*"Cavern Perfected, lofty and pure,
Four movements refine the immortal.
The Dao harmonizes with the Middle Origin,
Transformations arise naturally.
Flowing essences and mysterious dews

Supremely auspicious above,
Upright prosperity receives favor.
The Supreme bestows the talisman,
The Primordial Lord inscribes the mountain.
Extinguishing the corpse of death,
Severing the roots of the womb.
Eight Sceneries assist and wing,
Gathering and recording the myriad spirits.
Descending cloud chariots,
Conveying me to ascend the dawn."*

This is the Jade Emperor’s reversion of the August Supreme’s qi, whereupon he further receives the refinement of the Lofty Dawn’s Essence. Envision him and he returns to his true form.

To practice the Way of the Jade Emperor, always on the first and fifteenth days of the month, bathe and enter the chamber, face east, and bow from the heart. After paying homage to the Jade Emperor, turn to face north, click the teeth twelve times, close the eyes, and envision the August Supreme Jade Emperor shifting his form with the four seasons, residing in the Upper Clarity’s Cavern Cloud Palace, within the Mist Immortal Prefecture’s Immortal Transformations Village of the Settled Subtlety Ward. His truth returns, descending to illuminate the space between one’s brows. Then softly invoke:

Ascending radiance to lofty subtlety.
Nine transformations of the Purple Origin,
Four qi refine the brilliance.

This Way of the August Supreme Emperor is the secret teaching of the Purple Chamber, conferred only upon those whose golden names and jade characters unite with the True. Those who attain it ascend as immortals, merging their forms with the Emperor. Should one lightly disclose it, the body perishes, seven generations of ancestors bear the blame, and for ten thousand kalpas, one may not enter the ranks of immortals.

The Supreme Purple Sovereign of the Grand Primordial Loftiest Void, the primal qi of the Radiant Dawn, bears the taboo name Zongfanlian and the style Xuan Shangmen. His stature spans fifty million *zhang*. In the third month of summer, he dons the Seven Treasures Crown of Heavenly Origin, robes of nine-colored pearl-and-crimson cloud-light brocade, wears the Six Fire Jades, and girds the Spirit-Flying Purple Sash. He stands upon a five-colored lion and lotus pedestal, his radiance illuminating the seventy-four directions of the Upper Clarity. When visualized, he returns to a height of five *cun* and two *fen*.

In the third month of autumn, he transforms into a being with a human head and tiger’s body, his form adorned with dark and yellow mottled patterns, resplendent with luminous brilliance that shines upon the ten directions. Within the purple qi, he stands upon the Five Mushrooms. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of winter, he transforms into a figure wreathed in golden light, bearing a floral canopy upon his neck, clad in thirty-two-colored robes resembling those of the celestial immortals. His luminous splendor gleams brightly, illuminating the Upper Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of spring, he transforms into a tri-colored radiance of purple, yellow, and green, intertwining and coiling, the three qi merging in primordial chaos within the Upper Clarity. This is the Purple Sovereign reverting to the qi of the Grand Primordial, further refining the essence of the Radiant Dawn. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Purple Sovereign, on the day of *gengshen*, purify oneself and enter the chamber. Facing south, bow in reverence to the Purple Sovereign, then turn north, click the teeth thrice, and close the eyes to visualize the Purple Sovereign of the Dao, whose form shifts with the four seasons, residing in the Golden Radiance Palace of the Upper Clarity, the Purple Brilliance Mansion of the Seven Origins Village within the Floral Canopy Ward. His truth returns, descending to illuminate one’s Purple Chamber Palace. Then softly invoke:

*"Radiant Dawn disperses the numinous,
Purple Sovereign receives the brilliance.
Nine transformations of the Grand Primordial,
Four refinements penetrate the subtle.
Grand Unity oversees destiny,
The Duke’s Son preserves longevity.
The Imperial Lord governs life,
Three luminaries converge in return.
In harmony with the True,
Blessings towering and majestic.
Spurring the dragon to ascend,
I rise to the Cloud Gate."*

[Conclude.] Cease the upward swallowing of the nine breaths. This is the secret essential of the Golden Chamber, transmitted to the Perfected of the Upper Clarity. Those who attain it ascend as immortals, their rank equal to the loftiest Perfected. Should one lightly disclose or neglect it, the body sinks into the river’s source, seven generations of ancestors bear the blame, and one may not enter the ranks of immortals.

The Lofty Peak Sovereign of the Middle Origin Purple Orchid, the primal qi of the Grand Dawn, bears the taboo name Huizhi and the style Tong Daye. His stature spans thirty million *zhang*. In the third month of autumn, he dons the Three Florals Treasure Crown, robes of divine essence in seven colors, girds the Flowing Gold Purple Seal, and wears the Stone Essence Golden Light Sword. He stands upon azure mist, riding a seven-colored tiger chariot, his radiance resplendent in thirty-two hues. When visualized, he returns to a height of three *cun* and three *fen*.

In the third month of winter, he transforms into a being with a tiger’s body and dragon’s head, his form adorned with five-colored mottled patterns, his luminous brilliance gleaming brightly. Within the azure clouds, he stands upon a five-colored lotus. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of spring, he transforms into a three-headed phoenix, his form adorned with nine-colored patterns, his radiance resplendent and brilliant, illuminating the Upper Clarity. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

In the third month of summer, he transforms into a dual radiance of purple and azure, intertwining and coiling like the rising sun. This is the Lofty Peak Sovereign reverting to the qi of the Purple Orchid, further refining the essence of the Grand Radiant Dawn. When visualized, he reverts to his true form.

To cultivate the Way of the Middle Origin Lofty Peak Sovereign, on the day of the Beginning of Autumn, purify oneself and enter the chamber. Facing west, bow in reverence to the Lofty Peak Sovereign, then turn north, click the teeth twelve times, and close the eyes to visualize the Lofty Peak Sovereign, whose form shifts with the four seasons, residing in the Numinous Radiance Palace of the Upper Clarity, the Divine Transformation Mansion of the Three Wheels Village within the Perfected Completion Ward. His truth returns, descending to illuminate the Five Viscera and Five Cities Palaces. Then softly invoke:

*"Grand Dawn returns the radiance, the Void Brightness divides,
Transforming to unite the nine refinements and three true wheels.
Numinous essence irrigates the Five Cities Gates,
Securing the spirits, consolidating qi, sealing the source of death.
Above, summoning the Lofty Void to summon the immortal host,
Soaring on feathered steps to ascend the Golden Portal.
For generations, partaking of the Imperial Seat, life preserved in full,
Seven generations rejoice together, freed from the Five Roots."*

[Conclude.] Cease the upward swallowing of the three breaths. This is the Purple Orchid Treasure Formula, revealed once in ten thousand kalpas. Those who attain it soar and ascend to the Jade Clarity.

The Purple Dawn Sovereign, Master of the Purple Void Jade Emperor, the primal qi of the Jade Dawn, bears the taboo name Linghuixiao and the style Duzhongguang. His stature spans seventy million *zhang*. chunks.original_text: 毕，咽气八过止。 知太素随四时之变，则寿万年，修行其道，飞行上清，轻泄灵文，身死失仙。 上清紫精三素君，元阳洞之气，讳霄华，字法灵曜，长七千万丈。 秋三月，头建通精晨冠，衣五色斑文虎衣，佩交灵素绶，带招仙之剑，立九色狮子之上，项生圆光，照明上清，思之还长七寸。 冬三月，紫精三素元君则变形为凤头人身，衣苍碧紫三色羽衣，光明流映上清之中，思之还反真形。 春三月，紫精三素元君则变形人头龙身，文彩焕曜，照明上清，思之还反真形。 夏三月，紫精三素元君则变形为黄黑二色之光，混沌相缠如云之升，此则反紫精之炁，更受炼洞阳之精，思之还反真形。 修行三元君之道，常以庚申之日，沐浴入室，西向再拜朝元君毕，还北向平坐叩齿三通，思三元君随四时形影，在上清玉皇宫宝云府三气乡交灵里中，回真下映，入兆大搥骨首之户，便微祝曰： 紫精散景晖，变炼九炁庭，方圆三便府，离合改运生，吐津灌日根，皇华曜紫清，寻我高上道，微中有至灵，谁能回我舆，与尔结玄名。 毕，咽气三过止。 有知此道，三素降真，修行九年，飞行上清。 皇清洞真君，元明皓灵之炁，讳元宝琮，字理玄赜，长五千万丈。 冬三月，冠三梁玉晨之冠，衣七色虎文之裘，带流金火铃七色杖幡，立三素飞云之上，光明炜晔玉虚之内，思之还长五寸五分。 春三月，洞真君则变形，头巾黄巾，衣四十二条法衣，手执华幡，在紫云之上，思之还反真形。 夏三月，洞真君则变形，冥日闭视，头戴华盖，足履莲华，思之还反真形。 秋三月，洞真君则变形为黄白二色之光，光明流焕在太空之中，照明十天，此则反皇清之气，更受炼明皓灵之精，思之还反真形。 修行洞真君之道，以立冬之日，沐浴入室，北向三拜，朝洞真君毕，北向平坐叩齿十二通，思洞真君随四时形影，在上清洞玄宫清微府玉相乡金婴里中，回真下映，入兆口之四际中，微祝曰： 皇清摽晨晖，灵气翼空迁，飘飘九九上，靡靡入帝晨，仰吸月中水，俯引日华根，洞炼广灵气，流芳灌我真，乘运寻帝君，意合致玉仙。 毕，咽气七过止。 有知洞真四变之道，三年则与神交言，修行九年，飞行玉清。 皇上四老道中君，元洞虚之气，讳镜际，字浩元，长七千万丈。 春三月，头建明真七宝玉冠，衣凤文斑袍，佩豁落流铃，带招真之剑，立于九色狮子之上，十二华光，在上清之上紫虚之中，思之还长七寸。 夏三月，道中君则变形为小儿，衣五彩之衣，口衔七星，立白云之上，思之还反真形。 秋三月，道中君则变形为人头蛇身，五色斑斓，在玉虚之上，思之还反真形。 冬三月，道中君则变形为青赤白三色之云，更相缠绕在玄空之中，此则反皇上之气，更受炼洞虚之精，思之还反真形。 修行道中君之道，常以冬至日，沐浴入室，束南向四拜，朝道中君毕，还北向平坐，叩齿十二通，思道中君随四时形影，在上清流精宫会明府太仙乡三清里中，回真下映，入兆背穷骨地户中，微祝日： 四老中真，散华云房，回景四陈，变化八方，吐纳三精，流映我官，仙魂仙魄，髓结玉容，乘虚策霄，飞入太空。 毕，咽气四过止。 有知道中君四变之道，寿享万年，修行致神降，白日升天。

chunks.original_text: 毕，仰咽十二气止。 有知元景四变之道，寿三千岁，修之九年，与真同景，飞行上清。 太清大道君，元景玉融之气，讳负上合，字灵幽会，长七千万丈。 冬三月，头建九元通天之冠，衣九色龙衣，佩三气中章，带交灵素绶，足立三素之云，光明焕耀，在上清之上，思之还长三寸二分。 春三月，太清大道君则变形为三头之凤，口衔素绶，一身有九色之羽，文彩焕烂，洞映上清，思之还反真形。 夏三月，太清大道君则变形为三月之圆光，色赤，混沌如车之轮，光明洞曜，在太清之上，思之还反真形。 秋三月，太清大道君则变形为紫白黄三色之光，光明焕焕，洞照上清，此则反太清之气，更受炼元景玉融之精，思之还反真形。 修行太清大道君之道，常以立春之日，沐浴入室，北向三拜朝道君毕，还北向平坐叩齿三通，思大道君随四时形影，在上清上初宫始生府六合乡风生里中，回真下降，入兆喉内极根之户，微祝曰： 太清散灵，九炼吐津，金光玉符，五色流烟，上化下合，变景九天，万神混炼，内照成仙，〔入室〕辅真，飞晨帝庭。 毕，仰咽三气止。 有知此道则不死，修之九年神仙。 皇初紫元君，元融生之气，讳兴劫行，字一炁真，长九千万丈。 春三月，头建紫元宝琅神冠，衣三色虎文之裘，佩素灵之绶，立三素之云，光明焕照，洞观十方，在上清之上八微之内，思之还长九寸九分。 夏三月，皇初紫元君则变形为大仙，通身金色，项负圆明，文彩焕烂，光明奕奕，照映十方，思之还反真形。 秋三月，皇初紫元君则变形为三色童子，衣五彩衣，手把华幡，奕奕焕焕，照明上清，思之还反真形。 冬三月，皇初紫元君则变形为苍碧紫三色之光，光明焕曜，照朗上清，此则反皇初之气，更受炼元融生之精，思之还反真形。 修行紫元君之道，常以太岁、甲子之日，沐浴入室，南向一拜，朝紫元君毕，还北向平坐，叩齿三通止。 思紫元君随四时形影，在上清高虚宫重空府霄中乡神汉里中，回真下降，入兆泥丸鼻两孔下源之中，微祝曰： 紫皇元初，道合玄虚，三变九分，混化太初，结精未散，道灵金华，黄上观真，辅明玉书，天魂检气，神升紫虚，飞灵流軿，苍盖绿舆，运致我身，朝谒方诸。 毕，咽气九过止。 此上皇妙道，秘於朱台，得修其法，飞升上清。 轻泄灵文（以下原本缺） #1按本篇内容大致与《上清元始变化宝真上经九灵太妙龟山玄箓》一书卷上相同。 但本篇中错字漏字多达数百处，现均已据另一本卷上改正。 为免烦琐，不另出详细校记。
